nas sbyin pa'i bdag po sbyin bdag chen po'i mi de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can 'di dag thams cad kyang bdag gis brtsen du bcug /dga' bar byas/ bde bar
gsos na/ sems can 'di dag mgo skya zhing gnyer mas gang ste/ na tshod lo brgyad cu lon pas rgas te 'chi ba'i dus byed par yang nye bar gyur na/ bdag gis 'di
dag de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu btsud de rjes su bstan to snyam nas/ ma pham pa/ de nas mi des sems can de dag thams cad
de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la yang dag par btsud de/ yang dag par btsud nas 'dzin du bcug la/ sems can de dag gis kyang chos de
mnyan te thos nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam gcig la 'dus te thams cad rgyun du zhugs par gyur/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur
pa nas/ zag pa zad pa bsam gtan pa bsam gtan chen po rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa'i dgra bcom pa'i bar du gyur na/ ma pham pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ sbyin
ba'i bdag po sbyin pa'i bdag po chen po'i mi de gzhi de las bsod nams mang po dpag tu med grangs med pa skyed dam/ de skad ces bka' stsal nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de de lta lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ de de lta lags te/ sbyin pa'i bdag po
sbyin pa'i bdag po chen po'i mi de sems can de snyed la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad stsal ba'i slad du rgyu des kyang bsod nams mang du skyed na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de'i 'og tu dgra bcom
pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de skad ces gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa la 'di skad ces bka'
stsal to/ /ma pham pa khyod mos par bya/ khong du chud par bya'o/ /sbyin pa'i bdag po sbyin bdag chen po'i mi gang gis/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bzhi'i
sems can thams cad la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro byas te/ dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu rab tu bkod nas bsod nams bskyed la /gang yang
gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de thos pa lnga bcu par gyur pa'i mi des/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshigs su bcad pa gcig gam tshig gcig tsam thos te rjes su yi rang na/ gang
mi de'i rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po ni/ sbyin ba'i bdag po sbyin bdag chen po'i mi de'i sbyin pa dang ldan pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa
dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de bas gang mi gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i lnga bcu pa'i mis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshigs su bcad pa gcig gam tshig
gcig thos nas rjes su yi rang ba ni ches mang ste/ ma pham pa/ rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang / dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa 'di'i
mdun na/ snga ma'i sbyin pa dang ldan pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro /stong

gi char yang brgya stong gi char yang bye ba'i char yang bye ba brgya'i char yang bye ba stong gi char yang bye ba brgya stong gi char yang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/
bgrang bar yang char yang grangs su'ang dper yang rgyur yang mi bzod do/ /ma pham pa/ de ltar lnga bcu ba'i mi de tha na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshigs su bcad pa gcig gam tshig gcig
la rjes su yi rang ba'ang / bsod nams 'di snyed skyed na/ ma pham pa/ gang gis nga'i mngon sum du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan te thos nas rjes su yi rang ba lta ci smos te/ ma pham
ba| de'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa ni ches dpag tu med ches grangs med ces ngas bshad do/ /ma pham pa/ yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs
'di mnyan pa'i phyir/ bdag gi khyim nas byung ste gtsug lag khang du song la/ de phyin nas der 'greng ngam 'dug ste chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yud tsam mnyan na/ sems can de bsod
nams mngon par 'du bya ba de tsam byas shing bsags pas/ de tshe brjes nas lus phyi ma dang bdag gi ngo bo phyi ma thob pa la glang gi shing rta 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rta'i shing rta dang /
glang po che'i shing rta dang / khyogs kyi bzhon pa dang / gru'i bzhon pa dang / khyu mchog gi bzhon pa dang / lha'i gzhal med khang thob par 'gyur ro/ /gal te yang mdo'i chos sgrog
pa der yud tsam zhig 'dug ste chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan tam/ pha rol 'dug cu bcug gam/ sems can gzhan la stan bgos na/ bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa des/
brgya byin gyi stan dang / tshangs pa'i stan dang / 'khor lo sgyur ba'i seng ge'i khri thob par 'gyur ro/ /ma pham pa/ gal te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi
bu mo gang la las mi gzhan zhig la 'di skad du/ kye mi khyod tshur shog /dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyon cig ces smras la/ mi de'ang spro
ba rnyed nas gal te yud tsam zhig mnyan na sems can de spro ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus byas pa des/ gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
dang lhan cig 'grogs pa 'thob bo/ /blun por mi 'gyur ro/ /dbang po rno zhing shes rab dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /tshe rabs brgya stong du'ang kha rul cing mnam par mi 'gyur/ de la
lce nad med par 'gyur/ kha nad med par 'gyur/ so sngon por mi 'gyur/ so mi mnyam pa med pa dang / so mi ser ba dang / so gyed 'dums med pa dang / so sngo ba med pa dang / so
byung ba med pa dang / so yo ba med par 'gyur ro/ /mchu 'phyang du mi 'gyur/ mchu nang du song ba ma yin pa dang / mchu log pa med pa dang / mchu sho rer ma gyur pa dang / mchu yo ba
med pa dang / mchu gnag pa med pa dang / mchu mi sdug pa med par 'gyur ro/ /sna leb leb por mi 'gyur/ sna yon por mi 'gyur ro/ /gdong ring por mi 'gyur/ gdong
yon por mi 'gyur/ gdong nag por mi 'gyur/ gdong blta na mi sdug par mi 'gyur ro/ /ma pham pa/ 'di ltar lce dang / so dang / mchu srab cing shin tu legs par 'gyur/ sna che ba
dang / bzhin gyi dbyibs legs pa dang / smin ma legs pa dang / dpral ba'i dbyes che bar 'gyur/ dpe byad rdzogs pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gdams
pa dang rjes su bstan pa'ang thob par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang yang myur du phrad par 'gyur ro/ /ma pham pa ltos/ sems can gcig spro bar byas pas
kyang | bsod nams de tsam skyed na gang gis bsti stang du byas te mnyan tam/ bsti stang du byas te klog gam/ bsti stang du byas te ston tam/ bsti stang du byas te rab tu 'chad pa
lta ci smos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa lnga bcu pa/ /gang gis mdo 'di'i tshigs bcad
gcig mnyan te/ /thos nas sems dang rjes su yi rang ba'i/ /bsod nams ji snyed 'byung ba de nyon cig /gal te sbyin byed mi zhig byung gyur te/ /rtag tu sems can bye ba khrag
khrig la/ /gang sngar nga yis dpe byas de dag rnams/ /de kun lo yang brgyad cu tshim par byas/ /mgo la skra dkar gnyer ma kun byung ste/ /de dag rga la nyer gnas des mthong
nas| |kye ma sems can nyon mongs 'di dag kun/ /chos kyis 'di dag rab tu bstan par bya/ /de yis de rnams la ni phyi chos smras/ /mya ngan 'da'
pa'i sa yang rab tu bshad/ /srid pa thams cad dbu ba smig rgyu 'dra/ /srid pa kun la myur du yid byung byos/ /sbyin pa byed pa'i mi de'i gan nas su/ /sems can de dag kun gyis
chos thos nas/ /zag pa zad cing tha ma'i lus 'dzin par/ /dus gcig tu na dgra bcom thob gyur kyang / /gang zhig brgyud de tshigs bcad gcig thos shing / /rjes su yi rang
bsod nams ji snyed pa/ /de yi bsod nams de bas ches mang ste/ /bsod nams phung po snga mas char mi phod/ /gang gis brgyud de tshigs bcad gcig thos pa/ /de ltar
de yi bsod nams mang gyur te/ /de dag mtha' yas tshad kyang yong med na/ /mngon sum thos pa de ni smos ci dgos/ /gang der sems can gcig la'ang smras pa ni/ /bskal
pa bye ba khrag khrig du mar yang / /mdo 'di yang ni shin tu rnyed dka' yis /song ste chos nyon ces ni spro bar byas/ /sems can de dag de yis spro byas nas/ /mdo 'di yang ni yud
tsam nyan byed pa/ /de yi las kyi 'bras bu mnyan par gyis/ /nam yang de la kha yi nad med 'gyur/ /de yi lce yang na bar gzhar mi 'gyur/ /de yi so rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur
ro/ /sngon po ser po mi mthun gzhar mi 'gyur/ /mchu mi sdug par yang ni yong mi 'gyur/ /de gdong yo'am skam zhing rid pa med/ /nam yang sna leb tu ni yong mi 'gyur/ /so dang mchu
dang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor dang / /de yi sna dang dpral ba'i dbyibs kyang legs/ /mi rnams kyis ni blta na sdug par 'gyur/ /de yi kha ni rul par gzhar mi 'gyur/ /ut+pal bzhin
du rtag tu dri zhim pa/ /de yi kha nas dri yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dpa' bo khyim nas gtsug lag khang du song / /mdo sde nyan pa'i phyir ni der song ste/ /song nas der ni yud tsam des
chos mnyan/ /dad pa'i sems kyi 'bras bu mnyan par gyis/ /de yi lus ni shin tu dkar bar 'gyur/ /brtan pa de ni rta yi shing rtas 'gro/ /glang chen shing rta mthon por 'dug
nas su/ /rin po che yis brgyan pa zhon zhing chag /shin tu spud pa'i khyogs kyang des thob nas/ /de dag du ma mi yis bteg cing bkur/ /chos nyan phyir ni song ba gyur pa
de'i| |'bras bu dge ba 'di 'drar 'gyur ba yin/ /de ni 'khor gyi nang der 'dug nas su/ /dkar po'i las rnams byas pa de dag gis/ /tshangs pa'i stan dang rgyal po'i stan
rnams dang / /brgya byin stan rnams kyang ni des thob 'gyur/ /dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po las/ rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu bdun pa'o// //
dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po/ bam po bcu gcig pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rgyun du brtson
la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa'am klog pa'am ston pa'am yi ger 'dri ba'ang rung ste/ rigs kyi bu de mig gi yon tan brgyad brgya
thob par 'gyur ro/ /rna ba'i yon tan stong nyis brgya thob par 'gyur ro/ /sna'i yon tan brgyad brgya thob par 'gyur ro/ /lce'i yon tan stong nyis brgya thob par 'gyur ro/ /lus
kyi yon tan brgyad brgya thob par 'gyur ro/ /yid kyi yon tan stong nyis brgya thob par 'gyur ro/ /de yon tan brgya phrag mang pos dbang po drug gi grong yongs su dag cing / shin
tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /de'i pha dang ma las byung ba'i sha'i mig tha mal ba de ltar yongs su dag pa'i mig gi dbang pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
kyi phyi nang dang / brag dang / nags stug por bcas pa dang / 'og tu mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po la thug pa yan chad/ steng du srid pa'i rtse mor thug pa'i bar
du de dag thams cad mthong ngo / /sha'i mig tha mal bas sems can gang dag der skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ste/ de dag gi las kyi rnam par smin pa'ang shes
so| |de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /'khor gyi dbus su mi 'jigs pa/ /gang zhig mdo sde 'di 'chad cing / /le lo med par
rab 'chad pa/ /de yi yon tan nga las nyan/ /yon tan dag ni brgyad brgya yi/ /de yi mig ni kun tu mdzes/ /des ni de mig dri ma med/ /rnyog pa med cing dag par 'gyur/ /pha dang
ma las byung ba yi/ /de yi sha yi mig des ni/ /'jig rten khams 'di thams cad kyang / /phyi nang bcas pa rab tu mthong / /lhun po'i ri rab thams cad dang / /kho ra yug kyang des
mthong ste/ /ri gzhan gang rnams grags pa dang / /rgya mtsho dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ /'og tu mnar med dmyal bar thug /steng du srid pa'i rtser gnas pa/ /brtan pa des ni
kun mthong ste/ /sha yi mig ni de 'dra'o/ /da dung de la lha yi mig /med pas shes pa ma yin no/ /de yi sha yi mig gi yul/ /de dag de ltar 'gyur ba yin/ /rtag par rgyun du
brtson/ /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par bstan cing gzhan dag la yang dag par bshad na/ rna ba'i yon tan stong nyis brgya po
de dag dang ldan te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po la thug pa yan chad/ srid pa'i rtse mo la thug pa man chad na/
phyi nang gi sgra rnam pa mang po gang dag 'byung ba 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i sgra'am/ rta'i sgra'am/ rnga mo'i sgra'am/ ba glang gi sgra'am/ ra'i sgra'am/ shing
rta'i sgra'am/ du ba'i sgra'am/ mya ngan gyi sgra'am/ 'jigs pa'i sgra'am/ dung gi sgra'am/ dril bu'i sgra'am/ rnga'i sgra'am/ rtsed mo'i sgra'am/ glu'i sgra'am/ rol mo'i sgra'am/
skyes pa'i sgra'am/ bud med kyi sgra'am/ khye'u'i sgra'am/ bu mo'i sgra'am/ chos kyi sgra'am/ chos ma yin pa'i sgra'am/ bde ba'i sgra'am/ sdug bsngal ba'i sgra'am/ byis
pa'i sgra'am/ 'phags pa'i sgra'am/ yid du 'ong ba'i sgra'am/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra'am/ lha'i sgra'am/ klu'i sgra'am/ gnod sbyin gyi sgra'am/ dri za'i sgra'am/ lha ma
yin gyi sgra'am/ nam mkha' lding gi sgra'am/ mi'am ci'i sgra'am/ lto 'phye chen po'i sgra'am/ mi'i sgra'am/ mi ma yin pa'i sgra'am/ me'i sgra'am/ chu'i sgra'am/ rlung gi
sgra'am/ grong gi sgra'am/ grong khyer gyi sgra'am/ dge slong gi sgra'am/ nyan thos kyi sgra'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sgra'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i sgra'am/ de bzhin gshegs
pa'i sgra'am/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyi nang na/ sgra ci byung ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rna ba'i dbang po thams nga yongs su dag pa des thos
te| re zhig lha'i rna ba ni mi sgrub mod kyi/ sems can de dang de dag gi skad du rab tu rtogs so/ /sems can de dang de dag gis skad la rnam par rtog go /rnam par 'byed do/ /rna ba'i
dbang po tha mal pa des sems can de dang de dag gis skad rnams thos kyang / de'i rna ba'i dbang po la sgra de dag thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non to/ /rtag par rgyun du brtson/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rna ba'i dbang po 'di lta bu thob par 'gyur te/ re zhig lha'i rna ba ni mngon par mi sgrub bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde
bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/ ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de yi rna ba'i dbang po tha mal pa/ /rnyog pa med cing rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /'jig
rten khams 'di dag na ma lus par/ /rnam pa mang po'i sgra rnams des thos te/ /rnga bo che dang rdza rnga sgra snyan dang / /pi wang gling bu dang ni pa la ki /shing rta ba lang ra dang lug dag dang /
rta dang glang chen dag gi sgra yang thom/ /'jam zhing yid 'ong glu yi dbyangs kyang thos/ /brtan pa de ni de la chags pa med/ /gang dang gang na su dang su smra ba/ /bye ba snyed kyi mi yi sgra
rnams thos/ /lha yi sgra dang klu yi dbyangs rnams kyang / /snyan cing yid du 'ong ba rtag par thos/ /skyes pa bud med dag gi sgra rnams dang / /khye'u dang bu mo'i sgra yang de bzhin thos/ /
ri dang phug na gang gnas de dag dang / /khu byug rma bya ka la ping+ka dang / /bya rnams gang dag shang shang te'u rnams dang / /de dag rnams kyi sgra
snyan 'dir thos so/ /sems dmyal dag na sdug bsngal gang myong ba/ /shin tu mi bzad pa yi sgra rnams dang / /zas kyi sdug bsngal dag gis nyen pa yi/ /yi dwags rnams
kyi sgra phyung de bzhin thos/ /lha ma yin dang rgya mtsho'i nang gnas dang / /sgra 'byin pa dang de bzhin gzhan dag dang / /chos smra ba de 'di na 'dug bzhin du/ /sgra rnams thams
cad thos te chod pa med/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dag na phan tshun du/ /smra bar byed pa'i sgra rnams gang yin pa/ /rnam pa tha dad sgra rnams mang po dag /de ni 'di na 'dug bzhin de
dag thos/ /lha gang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gnas pa dang / /gang dag 'og min dang ni 'od gsal lha/ /phan tshun du ni sgra skad gang 'byin pa/ /de dag ma lus thams cad
des thos so/ /bde bar gshegs kyi bstan la rab byung nas/ /dge slong gang dag kha ton byed pa dang / /'khor gyi nang na chos ston gang yin pa/ /de dag sgra yang rtag tu
de yis thos/ /'jig rten khams 'dir byang chub sems dpa' gang / /kha ton dag kyang byed cing phan tshun du/ /chos rnams yang dag rjod par gang byed pa/ de dag sgra
rnams rnam pa tha dad thos/ /byang chub sems dpa' mdo 'di gang 'dzin pas/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan mi 'dul kha lo sgyur/ /'khor rnams la yang chos mchog gang gsung ba/ /
dus gcig tu ni de yang de yis thos/ /mnar med yan chad steng du srid pa'i rtse/ /stong gsum gyi ni zhing 'di thams cad na/ /nang logs dag dang phyi logs dag nas kyang / /sems
can gang gis sgra mang phyung ba dang / /sems can kun gyi sgra rnams thos gyur kyang / /'on kyang de yi rna ba 'gag pa med/ /dbang po gsal zhing gnas dang gnas kyang shes/ /rna ba'i
dbang po tha mal de tsam mo/ /re zhig lha yi la ni 'bad mi byed/ /tha mal rna ba de ni de ltar 'dug /'jigs med gang gis mdo 'di bzung ba ni/ /de yi yon tan dag ni de 'drar 'gyur/ /
rtag par rgyun du brtson gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin tam/ rab tu ston tam/ kha ton byed dam/ yi ger 'dri ba de/ sna'i yon tan
brgyad brgya dang ldan zhing sna'i dbang po yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ de'i sna'i dbang po yongs su dag pa des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyi nang gi dri rnam pa
mang po yod pa 'di lta ste/ rul ba'i dri'am/ yid du 'ong ba'i dri'am/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i dri'am/ me tog rnam pa tha dad pa'i dri 'di lta ste/ sna ma'i me tog dang / ma li ka dang / tsam+pa
ka dang / skya snar gyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro/ /chu las skyes pa'i me tog rnam pa mang po'i dri rnams kyang tshor te 'di lta ste/ ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu
ta dang / pad+ma dkar po rnams kyi dri dag kyang tshor ro/ /me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing rnam pa mang po'i me tog dang / 'bras bu'i dri rnams kyang tshor te/ 'di lta ste/ tsan+dan dang /
ta ma la'i 'dab ma dang / rgya spos dang / a ga ru'i dri zhim po rnams kyang tshor ro/ /spos rnam pa tha dad pa brgya stong gnas gcig na 'dug pa thams cad kyang
tshor ro/ /thams cad kyang shes so/ /sems can gyi dri rnam pa mang po'ang tshor te 'di lta ste/ glang po che dang / rta dang / ba lang dang / ra lug dang / phyugs kyi dri rnams
kyang tshor ro/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags rnam pa mang po'i lus kyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro/ /skyes pa dang / bud med kyi lus kyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro/ /khye'u dang /
bu mo'i lus kyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro/ /rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang / nags thag ring po na 'dug pa'i dri rnams kyang tshor ro/ /dri yang dag par tshor te dri yang dag
par shes mod kyi/ dri de dag gis mi 'phrogs/ de dag gis myos par mi 'gyur ro/ /de 'di na 'dug bzhin du lha dag gi dri rnams kyang tshor te 'di lta ste/ yongs 'dus brtol

gyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro/ /me tog man+da ra dang / man+da ra chen po dang / many+dzu Sha ka dang / many+dzu Sha ka chen po rnams kyi lha'i dri rnams kyang tshor ro/ /lha'i a ga ru'i phye ma dang / tsan+dan
gyi phye ma dag gi dri rnams kyang tshor ro/ /lha'i me tog rnam pa tha dad pa brgya stong gi dri dag kyang tshor ro/ /de dag gi mang rnams kyang shes so/ /lha'i bu'i lus kyi dri rnams kyang tshor te
'di lta ste/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi lus kyi dri'ang tshor ro/ /rnam par rgyal pa'i khang bzang na rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod pa'am/ chos bzang lha'i 'dun sa na sum cu rtsa
gsum pa'i lha rnams la chos ston pa'am/ rtse dga' ba'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi sar byung bde'ang shes so/ /lha'i bu gzhan rnams kyi so so'i lus kyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro/ /lha'i
bu mo rnams dang lha'i chung ma rnams kyi lus kyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro/ /lha gzhon nu rnams kyi lus kyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro/ /lha gzhon nu ma rnams kyi lus kyi dri rnams kyang tshor te/ dri
de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs shing myos par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam grangs 'dis srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du skyes pa'i sems can de dag gi lus kyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro/ /tshangs
ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams kyi lus kyi dri rnams kyang sor ro/ /rnam grangs 'dis lha'i ris thams cad kyi lus kyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro/ /nyan thos dang /
rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dag gi sku'i dri rnams kyang tshor ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dag
gi gdan gyi dri rnams kyang tshor ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na bzhugs pa de'ang rab tu shes so/ /de'i
sna'i dbang po de'ang dri rnam pa mang po de dang de dag gis mi 'phrogs te/ nyams pa'am gnod par 'gyur ba'ang med do/ /de 'dod na dri de dang de dag gzhan dag la'ang
ston te/ de dran pa nyams par 'gyur ba med do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /de yi sna yi dbang po rnam dag
'gyur/ /gang rnams 'jig rten khams 'di thams cad na/ /dri zhim dri mi zhim pa ci yod pa/ /des ni rnam pa mang po'i dri yang tshor/ /sna ma'i me tog dri dang ma li
ka /tsan+dan ta ma la yi 'dab ma dang / /rgya spos dag dang a ga ru yi dri/ /me tog 'bras bu sna mang de dag dang / /skyes pa bud med ring na 'dug pa dang / /khye'u
rnams dang ni bu mo de dag dang / /sems can rnams kyi dri yang de bzhin shes/ /de yi gnas kyang des ni dri las shes/ /'khor los bsgyur rgyal rnams kyang de yis
shes| |stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur dang rgyal phran dang / /de bzhin khye'u dang bu mo de dag dang / /chung ma'i 'khor kun dri las de yis shes/ /yongs su longs spyod rin chen
rnam mang dang / /sba ba gang dag sa la 'dug rnams dang / /bud med rin po cher gyur de dag kyang / /byang chub sems dpa' de yis dri las shes/ /de dag rnams kyi rgyan
rnams ci yod pa/ /lus la btags pa rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs/ /gos dang phreng ba byug pa spos rnams kyang / /dri las byang chub sems dpa' de yis shes/ /de bzhin 'greng dang
'dug dang nyal ba dang / /rtsed mo dga' ba mthu stobs thams cad kyang / /mdo sde dam pa 'di ni gang 'dzin pa/ /brtan pa de yi sna yi stobs kyis shes/ /spos mchog 'bru mar dri yang
de bzhin te/ /me tog 'bras bu rnam pa mang po'i dri/ /dri 'di ga ge mo na yong ces kyang / /'dug bzhin du ni cig car shes shing tshor/ /ri yi phrag ni rnam pa sna tshogs na/ /tsan+dan me
tog rgyas mang gang yod dang / /sems can gang dag de na gnas pa yang / /mkhas des de dag thams cad dri las shes/ /khor yug ngos la gang dag gnas pa dang / /rgya mtsho'i
dbus na gang dag 'khod pa dang / /sa yi dbus na sems can gang gnas pa/ /mkhas pa des ni thams cad dri las shes/ /lha dang lha ma yin yang de bzhin shes/ /des ni lha
min bu mo dag kyang shes/ /lha ma yin gyi rtsed mo dga' ba'ang shes/ /de yi sna yi dbang po'i mthu de 'dra/ /nags khrod dag na rkang bzhi gang yod
pa| |seng ge stag dang de bzhin glang chen mchog /de na ma he ba lang ba men rnams/ /de dag gnas pa de yi sna yis shes/ /bud med gang dag sbrum mar gyur pa dang / /khye'u
'am 'on te bu mo gang yin pa/ /rum na 'chang ba shin tu ngal ba'i lus/ /de la gang yod de yi dri las shes/ /sems can mngal du zhugs pa'ang des shes te/ /rnam par
'jig pa'i chos kyang de yis shes/ /bud med 'di ni sdug bsngal rnams dang bral/ /bsod nams ldan pa'i bu ni 'byung bar shes/ /skyes bu'i bsam pa mang por rab shes
te| |bsam pa'i dri yang de bzhin de yis tshor/ /'dod chags zhe sdang de bzhin 'chab pa dag /nye bar zhi ba'i sems kyi dri yang tshor/ /sa la gter rnams gang dag yod
gyur pa/ /nor rnams dang ni gser dngul 'gron bu yis/ /lcags kyi sgrom rnams de bzhin gang ba dag /dri las byang chub sems dpa' de yis shes/ /mu tig nor bu do
shal se mo do/ /rin thang med pa'i rin chen rnam mang po/ /rin thang med pa'i ming dang 'od dbyibs kyang / /de dag thams cad de yi dri las shes/ /de bzhin steng gi lha yi me
tog rnams/ /man+dA ra dang many+dzu Sha ka dang / /yongs 'du'i me tog gang dag yod gyur pa/ /dpa' bo 'di na 'dug bzhin de dag tshor/ /gang gi gzhal med khang rnams ci 'dra ba/ /
yangs dang 'bring dang de bzhin chung ngu dang / /de na rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs yod pa/ /'di na 'dug bzhin sna yi stobs kyis tshor/ /skyed mos tshal gyi sa yang de bzhin shes/ /
chos bzang dang ni rnam par rgyal ba yi/ /khang bzang mchog na lha gang 'khod pa dag /de na lha'i bu brtse na pa'ang rtag tu shes/ /gang zhig gang na las ni byed pa'ang / /'dug
dang nyal dang gang du 'gro ba yang / /'di na 'dug bzhin de dag dri yang tshor/ /lha yi bu rnams des ni dri las shes/ /me tog mang brgyan lha yi bu mo gang / /phreng ba thogs shing
lhab lhub rnams kyis brgyan/ /gang dang gang du brtsen zhing 'dong ba dag /byang chub sems dpa' de yis dri las shes/ /steng du srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar gyi lha/ /tshangs pa tshangs
chen gzhal med khang rgyu ba/ /bsam gtan gnas sam 'on te langs pa yang / /de dag der ni dri las rab tu shes/ /'od gsal gyi ni lha yi bu rnams kyang / /'chi 'phos skyes
pa gsar du 'ongs pa shes/ /byang chub sems dpa' mdo 'di 'dzin pa yi/ /sna yi dbang po 'di 'drar 'gyur ba yin/ /dge slong gang rnams bde gshegs bstan pa
la| |mngon par brtson pa 'chag cing 'dug pa dang / /lung nod kha ton mos pa'i dge slong rnams/ /thams cad byang chub sems dpa'
de yis shes/ /rgyal ba'i sras po nyan thos gang yod pa/ /la la rtag tu shing drung gnas pa dag /dge slong 'di zhes bya bar 'dir gnas shes/ /de dag thams cad
mkhas pa des shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' dran ldan bsam gtan pa/ /rtag tu lung nod kha ton dga' gang dag /'khor gyi nang na chos kyang rab 'chad pa/ /
de dag dri las byang chub sems dpas shes/ /bde bar gshegs pa thub chen phyogs gang na/ /nyan thos dge 'dun mdun gyis bltas dus na/ /phan zhing thugs
brtse rab tu chos 'chad pa/ /'jig rten mgon po de yang dri las shes/ /sems can gang rnams chos 'di nyan pa dag /gang rnams thos nas dga' ba'i yid gyur
pa| |de na rgyal ba'i 'khor rnams thams cad kyang / /'di na 'dug bzhin byang chub sems dpas shes/ /de yi sna yi stobs ni de 'drar 'gyur/ /de la lha yi sna ni
da dung med/ /zag pa med par gyur pa lha yi sna/ /de yi sdun du 'gro par 'di 'gyur ro/ /rtag par rgyun du brtson/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de chos kyi rnam
grangs 'di 'dzin tam/ ston tam/ rab tu 'chad dam/ yi ger 'drir 'jug na/ lce'i yon tan stong nyis brgya po de dag dang ldan pa'i lce'i dbang po thob par 'gyur te/ de lce'i
dbang po de lta bus ro gang dag myangs pa dang / ro gang dag tshor ba dang / ro gang dag lce'i dbang po la reg pa de thams cad lha'i ro bro ba dam par 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar yid du mi 'ong
ba'i ro gang dag yang mi myong ba de lta bu myong bar 'gyur ro/ /yid du mi 'ong ba'i ro gang yin pa de dag kyang / de'i lce'i dbang po'i steng du reg na lha'i ro bro bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor
gyi nang du song nas chos gang bshad pa des/ sems can de dag dbang po tshim par 'gyur te/ mgu ba dang / yongs su mgu ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba skye'o/ /de'i sgra'ang
zab cing yid du 'ong la mnyen zhing snyan par 'gyur te/ snying la 'bab pa dang dga' bar 'gyur ba des sems can de dag dga' mgu yi rang ba'i sems su 'gyur ro/ /gang
dag la chos bshad pa de dag gis kyang de'i dbyangs 'jam zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba'i sgra thos nas/ lha rnams kyang blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /
chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i drung du 'gro bar sems so/ /lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo rnams kyang blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir drung du
'gro bar sems so/ /brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos
mnyan pa'i phyir drung du 'gro bar sems so/ /klu dang / klu'i bu mo rnams kyang blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir drung du 'gro bar
sems so/ /lha ma yin dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo rnams kyang blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir drung du 'gro bar sems so/ /
nam mkha' lding dang / nam mkha' lding gi bu mo rnams kyang blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir drung du 'gro bar sems so/ /mi'am
ci dang / mi'am ci'i bu mo dang / gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin gyi bu mo dang / sha za dang / sha za'i bu mo rnams kyang blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya dang /
chos mnyan par bya ba'i phyir drung du 'gro bar sems te/ de dag kyang de la bkur sti byed/ bsti stang du byed/ btsun par byed/ mchod pa dang / gsol bar byed/ dbul
bar byed do/ /dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams kyang lta 'dod par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / rgyal po'i blon
po rnams kyang lta 'dod par 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang / 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa bu dang bcas pa/ blon po dang bcas
pa| btsun mo'i 'khor bcas pa dang / g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa'ang bkur sti bya ba'i phyir lta 'dod par 'gyur ro/ /chos smra ba de de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad gsungs
pa bzhin yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du snyan pa'i chos 'chad do/ /bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / yul gyi mi gzhan dag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par tshe'i mtha' mar phyin
gyi bar du/ chos smra ba de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams kyang de la lta 'dod par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang de la lta
'dod par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang de la gzigs bzhed par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de phyogs gang na 'dug pa de'i phyogs su
de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs te chos 'chad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du 'gyur te/ de ltar de zab cing yid du 'ong ba'i chos rnams kyi sgra 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /de yi lce yi dbang po mchog tu 'gyur/ /nam yang ngan pa'i ro ni yong mi myong / /reg ma thag tu
lha yi ro bror 'gyur/ /lha yi ro bro shin tu ldan pa yin/ /rna bar snyan cing yid du 'ong ba dang / /'jam zhing mnyen pa'i sgra skad rab tu smra/ /'khor gyi
dbus der dga' bar 'gyur ba yi/ /zab mo'i dbyangs ni rtag par rab tu smra/ /bye ba khrag khrig du ma'i dpe rnams kyis/ /des bshad pa la chos rnams gang nyan pa/ /de na de la
mchog tu dga' ba skyed/ /de la mchod pa dpag tu med pa byed/ /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin lha min dang / /gsang ba bdag rtag tu de lta 'dod/ /chos 'di shin tu gus par nyan
pa de/ /yon tan 'di dag thams cad de yis 'gyur/ /'dod par gyur na 'jig rten khams 'di dag /dbyangs kyis thams cad du yang go bar byed/ /de yi dbyangs ni mnyen zhing
'jam pa ste/ /zab cing snyan la shin tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po sa bdag 'khor lo sgyur ba rnams/ /mchod pa'i phyir ni de yi drung du 'dong / /bu dang chung mar bcas te
thal mo sbyar/ /rtag tu de la chos ni nyan par 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin rnams kyis rtag tu bkur sti byed/ /klu dang dri za dag gi tshogs rnams dang / /sha za pho dang sha za mo rnams
kyis| |bsti stang ri mo mchod pa rnams kyang byas/ /tshangs pa rnams la de ni dbang byed 'gyur/ /lha bu dbang phyug che dang dbang phyug dang / /brgya byin de bzhin lha yi bu gzhan
dang | |lha yi bu mo mang po drung du 'gro /sangs rgyas 'jig rten phan zhing thugs brtse gang / /nyan thos bcas pas de yi dbyangs thos nas/ /zhal ston pa dang bsrung ba
dag kyang mdzad/ /chos 'di 'chad pa la ni dgyes par 'gyur/ /rtag par rgyun du brtson/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
'dzin tam/ klog gam/ rab tu 'chad dam/ ston tam/ yi ger bris na/ de'i lus kyi yon tan brgyad brgya thob par 'gyur ro/ /de'i lus yongs su dag ste pags pa'i
mdog bai DUR+ya ltar dag cing sems can rnams kyis mthong na dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i lus yongs su dag pa de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
thams cad snang ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang dag 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / ngan pa dang / bzang po dang / mdog
bzang po dang / mdog ngan pa dang / bde 'gro dang / ngan 'gro dang / ri khor yug dang / khor yug chen po dang / lhun po dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab la sems can gang
dag gnas pa rnams dang / 'og tu mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba la thug pa dang / steng du srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du sems can gang dag gnas pa de dag thams
cad kyang bdag gi lus la snang bar 'gyur ro/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas sam/
byang chub sems dpa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang la la dag bzhugs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag chos gang ston pa dang / sems can gang dag de bzhin
gshegs pa de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / sems can de dag thams cad kyi lus so sor thob pa'ang bdag gi lus la snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
ltar de'i lus yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /gang zhig rgya che mdo 'di 'dzin byed pa/ /de yi
lus ni yongs su dag par 'gyur/ /rnam dag bai DUR+ya ltar grub pa ste/ /rtag tu sems can rnams kyis mthong na dga'/ /me long phyis par gzugs brnyan snang ba
bzhin| /lus la 'jig rten de dag de bzhin snang / /sems can gzhan min rang byung de yis mthong / /yongs su dag pa'i lus ni de 'dra'o/ /'jig rten khams
'di'i sems can ci yod pa/ /lha mi lha ma yin dang gsang ba pa/ /sems dmyal yi dwags dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams/ /lus de la ni gzugs brnyan so sor snang / /srid
pa'i rtse bar gzhal med khang gi lha/ /brag rnams dang ni ri dang kho ra yug /gangs ri ri rab lhun po chen po rnams/ /de yi lus las rnam pa thams cad snang / /de yi lus
la nyan thos bcas pa yi/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang sangs rgyas sras gzhan yang / /byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu gang gnas dang / /tshogs la gang dag chos ston
rnams kyang snang / /de yi rnam dag lus ni de 'dra ste/ /'jig rten khams rnams thams cad de la snang / /de ni da dung lha yis ma thob ste/ /de yi rang bzhin lus ni de
'dra'o/ /rtag par rgyun du brtson/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ chos kyi rnam grangs
'di 'dzin tam/ ston tam/ rab tu 'chad dam/ yi ger 'dri'am/ klog na/ yid kyi las kyi yon tan stong nyis brgya po de dag dang ldan zhing yid kyi dbang po yongs su
dag par 'gyur ro/ /de yid kyi dbang po yongs su dag pa des/ tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig thos pas kyang de'i don mang por shes so/ /des de dag khong du chung nas
de'i phyir zla ba gcig tu chos ston to/ /zla ba bzhi'am lor yang chos ston to/ /chos gang bshad pa de la de brjed ngas bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten pa'i 'jig rten gyi
tha snyad gang dag skad dam sngags ci yod pa de dag thams cad chos kyi tshul dang sbyor ro/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
na| sems can 'gro ba drug tu skyes shing 'khor ba'i sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa'i g.yo ba rnams kyang shes so/ /g.yos pa dang
bsam pa dang spros pa rnams kyang shes shing rab tu rtogs so/ /re zhig 'phags pa'i ye shes ma thob kyang de'i yid kyi dbang po 'di lta bur yongs su dag par 'gyur
ro| |chos kyi nges pa'i tshig gang dang gang rjes su bsams te/ gtam ston pa de dag thams cad kyang yang dag par ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa
thams cad ston to/ /sngon gyi rgyal bas mdo sde'i rnam grangs bstan pa thams cad 'chad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka'
stsal to/ /de yi yid kyi dbang po rnam dag 'gyur/ /gsal zhing 'od gsal rnyog pa med pa ste/ /ngan pa bzang po de bzhin bar ma dang / /des ni rnam pa mang po'i
chos rab shes/ /brtan pa des ni tshigs bcad gcig thos kyang / /de don rnam pa mang po de yis shes/ /zla ba bzhi'am de bzhin lo yi bar/ /rtag tu yang dag 'brel
ba rab tu smra/ /sems can gang rnams 'jig rten khams 'di yi/ /phyi rol dag dang nang na gang gnas pa/ /lha mi lha ma yin dang gsang ba pa/ /klu dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas gar
song dang / /'gro ba drug na gnas pa'i sems can rnams/ /de dag rnams kyis rnam par ci bsams pa/ /skad cig tu ni thams cad mkhas pas shes/ /mdo 'dzin pa yi phan yon
'di dag go /bsod nams brgya yi mtshan ldan sangs rgyas kyis/ /'jig rten kun la chos gang rab bshad pa/ /de yi rnam par dag pa'i sgra yang thos/ /de yis ci bstan pa
yang des bzung ste/ /chos kyi mchog kyang mang du rnam par sems/ /de ni rtag tu mang po ston par 'gyur/ /de ni rmongs par nam yang mi 'gyur te/ /mdo 'dzin pa yi phan yon
'di dag go /des ni mtshams dang tshigs kyang rab tu shes/ /chos rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid mi mthun dang / /don dang nges pa'i tshig kyang rab tu shes/ /ji ltar de dag
shes pa bzhin du 'chad/ /sngon gyi 'jig rten dag gi slob dpon gyis/ /yun ring 'dir ni mdo sde gang bshad pa/ /de yi chos rnams 'khor gyi dbus su yang / /'jigs pa
med par rtag tu de 'chad do/ /mdo 'di bzung ba dang ni bklags pa yis/ /de yi yid kyi dbang po de 'drar 'gyur/ /da dung ma chags ye shes ma thob ste/ /'di ni de yi sngon du 'gro
bar 'gyur/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i mdo 'di 'dzin pa yang / /slob dpon gyi ni sa la 'dug pa yin/ /sems can thams cad la yang chos
smra ste/ /nges tshig bye ba snyed la mkhas par 'gyur/ /dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po las/ skye mched drug rnam par dag pa'i phan yon gyi le'u zhes bya ste bco brgyad
pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob la bka' stsal pa/ mthu chen thob /rnam grangs
'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ gang dag kha cig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'di rjod pa dang / mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang /
dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma la gshe zhing mi snyan par smra ba dang / tshogs pa mi dbyung ba'i tshig rtsub po zer ba de dag gi rnam par smin pa 'dod pa ma yin par 'gyur
te| de ni tshig gis brjod du'ang mi nus so/ /gang dag mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chad pa dang / gzhan dag
la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa de dag gi rnam par smin pa ni 'dod par 'gyur te/ ji ltar ngas sngar brjod pa de lta bur mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce
dang | lus dang / yid yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /mthu chen thob/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa yangs pa/ tshad
med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag gi'ang ches pha rol tu gyur ba de'i tshe de'i dus na tha dad du gnas pa'i bskal pa la/ 'jig rten gyi khams cher 'byung bar de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo
sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs bsgrags dbyangs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ mthu chen thob/
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jigs bsgrags dbyangs kyi rgyal po de 'jig rten gyi khams cher byung ba
de na lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun na chos ston te/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos rnams la ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang /
mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrugs pa las shin tu 'da' ba'i phyir /mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug
pa 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang ldan pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i chos ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rnams la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la brtsams te/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi mthar thug pa'i
chos ston to/ /mthu chen thob/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jigs bsgrags dbyangs kyi rgyal po de'i
tshe'i tshad ni/ bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gang+gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed du gyur to/ /de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya
stong phrag dzam+bu'i gling gi rdul phra rab snyed du dam pa'i chos gnas par gyur to/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gling bzhi'i rdul phra rab snyed du dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs
brnyan gnas par gyur to/ /mthu chen thob/ 'jig rten gyi khams cher 'byung ba de na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas 'jigs bsgrags dbyangs kyi rgyal po de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dam pa'i chos dang / dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan yang med par gyur nas/ de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jigs bsgrags dbyangs kyi rgyal po gzhan yang 'jig rten du byung ngo / /mthu chen thob/ de lta
bu gcig nas gcig tu cher 'byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jigs bsgrags dbyangs
kyi rgyal po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag nyi shu byung ngo / /mthu chen thob/ tha dad du gnas pa'i bskal pa la/ 'jig rten gyi khams cher 'byung ba der de bzhin gshegs pa
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/
bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa 'jigs bsgrags dbyangs kyi rgyal po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thog mar gang byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das yongs su
mya ngan las 'das pa de'i dam pa'i chos nub par gyur te/ dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan yang nub par gyur ba'i tshe/ de'i bstan pa la nga rgyal can gyi dge slong gis shin
tu non par gyur te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brnyas pa zhes bya ba'i dge slong zhig byung ngo / /mthu chen thob/ ci'i phyir byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rtag tu brnyas pa zhes bya zhe na/ mthu chen thob/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ dge slong
ngam| dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma su mthong yang rung ste/ de dag gi drung du song nas 'di skad du/ kho bo ni tshe dang ldan pa khyed la brnyas par mi
byed de/ khyed ni ma brnyes pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyed thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cig dang / khyed de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes smra'o/ /mthu chen thob/ rnam grangs 'dis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge slong du gyur pa de sems can
rgyang ring po na 'dug pa su mthong yang rung ste/ de'i drung du song zhing de skad du yang dag par sgrogs pa ma gtogs par lung yang mi nod/ kha ton yang mi byed de/ dge slong
ngam| dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma de dang de dag gi drung du song nas/ 'di skad du kho bo ni tshe dang ldan pa khyed la brnyas par mi byed de/ khyed ni ma
brnyas pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyed thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cig dang / khyed de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes smra'o/ /mthu chen thob/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des de'i tshe dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen
ma'am/ su dang su la de skad bsgrags pa de dag thams cad las phal cher de la khro zhing gnod par sems la ma dad pa skyed de/ de la gshe zhing spyos te/ ci'i phyir dge slong 'di
ma dris par brnyas pa'i sems med do zhes bdag cag la ston te/ bdag nyid la brnyas par byed cing 'di ltar ma bsams/ mi 'dod par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub tu bdag cag la lung ston ces smra'o/ /mthu chen thob/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de de lta bur gshe zhing spyo bas lo mang po 'das te/ su la'ang mi khro
zhing gnod sems mi skyed do/ /de ltar de yang dag par sgrogs pa la bod pa dang / dbyug pa 'phen kyang / des de dag la thag ring po nas sgra chen po byas te/ kho bo khyed la brnyas par mi
byed do zhes yang dag par sgrog go /des nga rgyal can gyi dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma de dag la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yang dag par bsgrags pas
de dag gis de la ming rtag tu brnyas pa zhes btags so/ /mthu chen thob/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brnyas pa de 'chi ba'i dus byed pa nye bar gnas te/
'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jigs bsgrags dbyangs kyi rgyal po des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di tshigs su bcad pa dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag nyi shu bshad
pa de'ang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brnyas pa de/ 'chi ba'i dus nye bar gnas pa'i tshe bar snang gi sgra las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos so/ /sus
kyang ma smras par des par snang las sgra thos te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung nas mig rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba rnam par dag pa dang / sna rnam par dag pa dang / lce rnam par dag
pa dang / lus rnam par dag pa dang / yid rnam par dag pa de lta bu thob bo/ /rnam par dag pa de dag thob ma thag tu phyir yang lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag nyi shur bdag gi srog
gi 'du byed byin gyis brlabs te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par bsgrags so/ /dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma nga rgyal can gang dag la
sngon khyed la kho bos brnyas par mi byed do zhes bsgrags pa gang dag gis/ de'i ming rtag tu brnyas par btags par de dag gis/ de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi mthu dang / dam
bcas pa'i stobs kyi mthu dang / spobs pa'i stobs kyi mthu dang / shes rab kyi mthu rgya chen po mthong nas/ thams cad kyang chos mnyan pa'i phyir phyin 'khod par gyur to/ /des
gzhan yang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par btsud do/ /mthu chen thob /byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ de nas shi 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po zhes bya bar
mtshan mthun pa bye ba brgya phrag nyi shu mnyes par byas te/ thams cad du'ang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par rab tu bstan to/ /de sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba des rim gyis de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes bya bar mtshan mthun pa bye ba brgya phrag nyi shu mthar gyis mnyes par byas nas/ de
thams cad du'ang dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ste/ 'khor bzhi la yang dag par rab tu bshad do/ /de sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba des mthar gyis
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin sgra rgyal po zhes bya bar mtshan mthun pa bye ba brgya phrag nyi shu mnyes par byas nas/ thams cad
du'ang dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid bzung ste/ 'khor bzhi la yang dag par rab tu bshad do/ /thams cad na'ang
mig yongs su dag pa dang ldan par gyur to/ /rna ba yongs su dag pa dang / sna yongs su dag pa dang / lce yongs su dag pa dang / lus yongs su dag pa dang / yid yongs su dag
pa de lta bu dang ldan par gyur to/ /mthu chen thob/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brnyes pa des/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong de snyed
la bsti stang byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mo dang / mchod pa dang / gsol ba dang / dbul ba byas te/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsti stang du bya ba
dang | bla mar bya ba dang / ri mo dang / mchod pa dang / gsol pa byas nas/ de dag thams cad du'ang dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ste/ sngon
gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid yongs su smin pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mthu chen thob/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jigs bsgrags dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i bstan pa la/ 'khor bzhi rnams kyis rtag tu
brnyas par grags shing / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de snyed mnyes par byas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag
tu brnyas pa de/ gzhan zhig yin snyam du som nyi'am/ yid gnyis sam/ the tshom za bar gyur na/ mthu chen thob khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i
dus na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brnyas pa zhes bya bar gyur to/ /mthu chen thob/ gal te ngas sngon chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma blangs ma bzung bar gyur na /nga 'di
ltar myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par mi 'gyur te/ mthu chen thob/ de ltar ngas sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gan nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ste/ bklags pa dang bstan pas de'i phyir nga 'di ltar myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mthu chen thob/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brnyas pa des dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge
bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma brgya phrag mang po dag la/ bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par bsgrags shing /kho bo khyed la brnyas
par mi byed do/ /khyed cag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cig dang / khyed de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes byas pa dang / gang gis byang chub sems dpa' de la gnod sems bskyed par gyur pa de dag gis bskal pa bye ba
brgya phrag nyi shur nam yang de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong / chos kyi sgra'ang ma thos/ dge 'dun gyi sgra'ang ma thos so/ /bskal pa stong phrag bcur mnar med pa'i
sems can dmyal ba chen por sdug bsngal mi bzad pa myong ngo / /de dag thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa de las yongs su thar nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po de nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so/ /mthu chen thob/ de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can du gyur pa/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la bsting ba dang / 'phya ba byas pa de dag gang yin snyam du som nyi'am yid gnyis sam the tshom za bar gyur na/ mthu
chen thob/ 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang na bzang skyong la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya dang / seng ge'i zla ba la sogs pa dge slong ma lnga brgya dang / bde gshegs
sems pa la sogs pa dge bsnyen ma lnga brgya ste/ thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par byas so/ /mthu chen thob/ chos kyi
rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / ston pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de ltar don che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par byed par 'gyur ro/ /mthu chen thob/ de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rnams kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyun mi 'chad par gzung bar bya'o/ /bstan par bya'o/ /bklag par bya'o/ /bshad par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /'das pa'i dus rnams rjes su dran pa ni/ /'jigs bsgrags dbyangs rgyal rgyal ba gang byung ba/ /lha mi gnod sbyin srin
po'i 'dren pa ste/ /mthu chen de la lha dang mi yis mchod/ /rgyal ba de ni mya ngan yongs 'das nas/ /dam chos 'khrugs par gyur pa tha ma la/ /de na byang chub sems dpa' dge
slong byung / /de yi ming ni rtag tu brnyas zhes bya/ /de na dge slong gzhan dang de bzhin du/ /dmigs par lta ba'i dge slong de gan song / /kho bos khyed la nam yang brnyas pa med/
khyed kyis byang chub mchog phyir spyad pa spyod/ /de bzhin rtag tu yang dag bsgrags pa na/ /gshe zhing brgyad pa de dag bzod par byed/ /'chi
ba'i dus byed nye bar gnas pa dang / /de yis mdo sde 'di ni thos gyur nas/ /de tshe mkhas pas 'chi ba'i dus ma byas/ /tshe yang shin tu ring por byin brlabs te/ /rnam
par 'dren pa de yi bstan pa la/ /de tshe mdo 'di yang ni rab tu bshad/ /dmigs can mang po de dag thams cad kyang / /de yis byang chub tu ni yongs smin byas/ /de nas
byang chub sems dpa' shi 'phos nas/ /sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong mnyes byas te/ /mthar gyis bsod nams byas pa de dag gis/ /mdo 'di yang ni rtag par rab tu
bshad/ /rgyal ba'i sras des byang chub yang dag thob/ /shAkya thub pa nga nyid de yin no/ /de tshe gang dag dmigs can dge slong dang / /dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen gang rnams
dang | |de na dge bsnyen ma rnams gang byung ba/ /mkhas pas de tshe byang chub bsgrags gyur pa/ /de dag rnams kyi sangs rgyas bye mang mthong / /de dag lnga brgya mi nyung 'di
rnams dang / /de bzhin dge slong pha dang dge slong ma/ /nga yi mngon sum dge bsnyen 'di dag ste/ /thams cad nga yis chos mchog thos byas nas/ /ngas ni 'di dag thams
cad yongs smin byas/ /mya ngan nga 'das dpa' bo 'di kun ni/ /'di na mdo sde mchog 'di 'dzin par 'gyur/ /bskal pa mtha' yas bye ba mang por yang / /'di 'dra'i chos
ni nam yang mi thos te/ /sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgya 'byung na yang / /de dag kyang ni mdo 'di mi 'chad do/ /de phyir rang byung nyid kyis brjod pa'i chos/ /'di lta bu yi
rnam pa thos nas su/ /yang dang yang ni rab tu 'di bzung la/ /mya ngan nga 'das mdo 'di rab shod cig /dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po las/ rtag tu brnyas pa'i le'u zhes bya ste
bcu dgu pa'o// //de nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab snyed gang dag sa rum nas 'thon pa de dag
thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan
las 'das nas/ bdag cag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag lags pa gang du bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan
las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de dang der chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu bshad par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag ni chos kyi rnam grangs rgya chen po 'di lta bu bzung ba dang / bklag
pa dang / bstan pa dang / rab tu bshad pa dang / yi ger 'dri bar 'tshal ba lags so/ /de nas 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye
ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na gnas pa dag dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha
dang | klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das
nas| bdag cag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par rab tu bshad par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ lus mi gda' bar bar snang la gnas te dbyangs kyis yang
dag par bsgrag par bgyi'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun pa'i sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po snga ma tshogs dang tshogs chen po dang / tshogs kyi slob dpon de dag gi gtso bo gcig po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa khyad par can
zhes bya ba/ tshogs dang tshogs chen po dang / tshogs kyi slob dpon la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /spyod pa khyad par can/ legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod kyis de ltar gyis shig dang /
chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i phyir khyed de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su smin par byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang de mchod rten gyi dbus na seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa gnyis
ka 'dzum pa mdzad nas/ gnyis ka'i zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po phyung ste/ ljags kyi dbang po de nyid kyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du phyin nas/ ljags kyi dbang
po de gnyis las 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po byung ngo / /'od zer de dag las 'od zer re re las kyang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po
lus kyi mdog gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/ pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri la 'khod pa dag byung ngo / /byang chub
sems dpa' de dag kyang phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong dag tu dong ste/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams de dag thams cad bar snang
la 'khod nas chos ston to/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya
thub pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang gi ljags kyi dbang pos rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul
mdzad pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gzhan dag nas /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas gang dag gshegs pa'i rin po che'i shing ljon pa'i drung dag na/ seng ge'i khri la so sor bzhugs pa de dag kyang ljags kyi dbang pos rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul mdzad
do| |de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
de dag thams cad kyis lo 'bum tshang gi bar du rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed pa mdzad do/ /de nas lo 'bum 'das nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis ljags kyi dbang po de dag bsdus te/ dus gcig tu skad cig thang cig yud tsam gcig la thams cad kyi mgur gsal ba'i sgra chen po
phyung ste/ se gol gtogs pa'i sgra gcig mdzad do/ /mgur gsal ba'i sgra chen po de dang / se gol gtogs pa'i sgra chen po des/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ji snyed pa de dag thams cad g.yos par gyur te/ g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu/
'gul| ldeg /rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg go /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa sems can ji snyed 'khod pa de dag de na 'dug bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi mthus de dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams
mi mjed 'di mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rin po che'i shing ljon pa'i drung na seng ge'i khri so so la bzhugs pa de dag dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang rin po che'i mchod rten chen po de'i dbus na seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub
pa dang lhan cig tu bzhugs pa dang / 'khor bzhi po de dag kyang mthong ngo / /de mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du gyur/ shin tu dga' ba thob
par gyur te bar snang las sgra 'di skad ces thos te/ kye grogs po dag /'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med grangs med pa dag 'das pa na 'jig
rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de/ da ltar dam pa'i chos pad+ma
dkar po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sde/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung
ba| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la yang dag par rab tu 'chad kyi/ de la khyed kyang lhag pa'i bsam pas rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig /bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la phyag tshol cig /mchod pa gyis shig ces thos so/ /de nas
sems can de dag thams cad kyis bar snang las de lta bu'i sgra thos nas de na 'khod bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal
lo zhes tshig de skad smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang / dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir thal mo
sbyar te/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i ba
dan mang po 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di ga la ba de logs su 'thor ro/ /phyang phrul dang / bgo ba dang / se mo do dang / do shal dang / nor bu dang / rin po che rnam pa mang po'ang
gtor to/ /me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan dang / rnam par rgyal
ba'i ba dan dang / se mo do dang / do shal dang / nor bu dang / rin po che gtor ba de dag thams cad la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos

dang | phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan rnam pa mang po dang / se mo do dang / do shal dang /
nor bu dang / rin po che de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di khebs par gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong de dag
dang lhan cig tu khebs par gyur nas gcig tu gyur te/ gang dag na de bzhin gshegs pa de dag bzhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig
brgya stong de dag thams cad kyi steng gi nam mkha' bar snang la me tog gi bla bre chen pos kun tu khebs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis spyod pa khyad par can la sogs
pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
kyi mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ rigs kyi bu dag /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su gtad pa'i phyir/ ngas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por chos kyi sgo rnam pa
tha dad pa dag gis phan yon gyi rnam grangs mang po bshad mod kyi/ ngas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i yon tan bshad kyang yon tan gyi pha rol tu mi phyin to/ /rigs kyi bu dag /
mdor na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog tu gyur pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsang chen thams ca dang / sangs rgyas kyi zab mo'i gnas
thams cad ngas chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir bshad do/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na khyed kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ chos kyi rnam grangs
'di la gus par gzung bar bya'o/ /bstan par bya'o/ /yi ger 'dri bar bya'o/ /bklag par bya'o/ /rab tu bshad par bya'o/ /bsgom par bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu dag /sa
phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di klog gam/ ston tam/ rab tu 'chad dam/ yi ger 'dri'am/ sems sam/ 'don tam/ kha ton byed dam/ glegs bam du byas pa/ kun
dga' ra ba 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ khyim mam/ gnas sam/ shing drung ngam/ khang pa'am/ gnas khang ngam/ phyug na 'dug kyang rung ste/ sa phyogs der de bzhin gshegs
pa'i phyir mchod rten bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa phyogs de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying por rig par bya ba dang / sa phyogs der de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par rig par bya ba dang / sa
phyogs der de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang / sa phyogs der de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das par
rig par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /mngon shes ye shes rab tu gnas rnams kyi/ /'jig
rten phan pa'i chos ni bsam mi khyab/ /lus can 'di kun mchog tu dga' ba'i phyir/ /mtha' yas spyan gyis rdzu 'phrul rab tu bstan/ /'od zer
stong rnams rab tu kun 'gyed cing / /ljags kyi dbang pos tshangs pa'i 'jig rten phyin/ /byang chub mchog la zhugs pa de dag phyir/ /ngo mtshar gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul de dag
bstan/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi mgur sel sgra mdzad cing / /se gol gcig gi sgra dag gang phyung ba/ /de dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten ji tsam pa/ /'jig rten khams de
thams cad go bar byas/ /ci nas de dag dga' nas phyi dus na/ /bde gshegs mya ngan 'das nas med 'dzin par/ /de dag dang ni cho 'phrul gzhan rnams dang / yon tan
rnams ni phan zhing thugs brtse bstan/ /'jig rten rnam 'dren mya ngan 'das pa na/ /mdo sde mchog 'di gang dag 'dzin pa yi/ /bde gshegs sras po rnams kyi bsngags
pa ni| |bskal pa bye ba stong phrag mang brjod kyang / /de dag gi ni yon tan mtha' yas te/ /ji ltar phyogs rnams su ni nam mkha' bzhin/ /gang dag rtag tu mdo sde 'di
'dzin pa/ /de dag yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab 'gyur/ /'jig rten 'dren pa mya ngan 'das 'di dang / /nga dang 'dren pa 'di dag thams cad mthong / /byang chub sems
dpa' mang po 'di kun dang / /'khor bzhi rnams dang de yis mthong ba yin/ /de yis deng 'dir nga ni mnyes par byas/ /rgyal ba'i dbang po mya ngan 'das 'di dang / /phyogs bcu
rnams na gang dag gzhan bzhugs pa/ /'dren pa de dag thams cad mnyes par byas/ /gang zhig mdo sde 'di ni 'dzin byed pa/ /'das dang da ltar ma byon sangs rgyas dang / /
phyogs bcu dag na gang dag bzhugs pa yang / /de kun mthong zhing shin tu mchod par 'gyur/ /mdo sde yang dag chos 'di gang 'dzin pas/ /byang chub snying po rnam par gang
dgongs pa/ /skyes mchog rnams kyi gsang chen shes par 'gyur/ /de ni de yang myur du rjes su sems/ /gang zhig mdo sde dam pa 'di 'dzin pa/ /'di yi spobs pa dag ni
mtha' yas 'gyur/ /ji ltar rlung ni gang du'ang thogs med bzhin/ /chos dang don dang nges pa'i tshig kyang shes/ /'dren pa rnams kyis dgongs te gang gsungs pa/ /mdo sde
rnams kyi mtshams sbyar rtag tu shes/ /rnam par 'dren pa mya ngan 'das pa yi/ /mdo sde rnams kyi yang dag don des shes/ /zla ba nyi ma 'dra bar de 'gyur te/ /de ni shin tu snang
zhing gsal byed 'gyur/ /de ni sa la rgyu zhing de dang der/ /byang chub sems dpa' mang po yang dag 'dzud/ /de bas byang chub sems dpa' mkhas gang dag /'di 'dra pa yi
phan yon 'di thos nas/ /mya ngan nga 'das mdo 'di gzung zhig dang / /de dag the tshom med par byang chub 'gyur/ /dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar
po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu pa'o// //dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po/ bam po bcu
gnyis pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa
la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dam pa'i chos
pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di/ lus la thogs sam glegs bam du bgyis te 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams ji snyed cig skyed par
'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sman gyi
rgyal po/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang+gA'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed la bsti stang du byed/ btsun
par byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod pa byed na/ sman gyi rgyal po/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed dam/ gsol
pa| bcom ldan 'das/ mang lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman gyi rgyal po khyod mos par bya'o/ /khong du
chud par bya'o/ /sman gyi rgyal po/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa
gcig tsam yang 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / nan tan gyis sgrub na/ sman gyi rgyal po/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las de bas ches
bsod nams mang du skyed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang
dam pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lus la thogs sam glegs bam du bgyis te/ 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de bdag gis bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba ba'i slad
du gzungs sngags kyi tshig rnams stsal bar bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ a n+ye/ ma ne ma ma ne/ tsit+te tsi ra te/ sha me sha me yi tA b+hi/ shAn+te/ muk+te/ muk+ta ta me sa me/ a bi sha
me sa ma sa me/ dza ye/ k+Sha ye ak+Sha ye/ ak+Shi No/ shAn+te/ sha mi te d+hA ra NI/ A lo ka b+hA se/ pra t+ya bek+Sha NI/ bi bi ru a b+h+yan+ta/ ra ni bi Sh+Te/ a b+h+yan+ta ra

ni biSh+Ti a t+yan+ta pa ri shud+d+hi/ ut+ku le/ mut+ku le/ a ra Te/ pa ra Te/ shru kA k+ShI a sa ma sa me/ bud+d+ha bi lo ki te/ d+harma pa rI k+Shi te/ sang+g+ha ni rgo Sha NI/ ni r+g+ho Sha NI/ b+ha yA b+ha ya/ sho d+ha nI
man+t+re man+t+ra/ k+Sha ya te ru ta kau sha la/ ak+Sha ye ak+ShA ba na tA yA pa lo/ /a man+ya na tA ya/ bcom ldan 'das/ gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das gang+gA'i klung drug cu'i bye ma snyed kyis bshad pa ste/ gang gis mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa chos smra ba 'di lta bu de dag dang 'gal bar bgyis na sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das de dag thams cad la de 'khus pa lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po la 'di skad ces
bka' stsal to/ /sman gyi rgyal po khyod kyis gzungs sngags kyi tshig rnams smras pas/ sems can mang po'i don byas shing sman gyi rgyal po sems can rnams la snying brtse
ba'i phyir bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba byas pa legs so/ /legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab
tu sbyin pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis kyang / chos smra ba 'di lta bu dag gi ched du gzungs sngags kyi tshig rnams stsal bar bgyi ste/ des chos smra ba
'di lta bu de dag la glags lta ba gang gis kyang glags mi rnyed pa 'di lta ste/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po'am/ srul po'am/ gshed byed dam/ grul bum mam/ yi dwags glags lta ba rnams
kyis glags mi rnyed do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu sbyin pas de'i tshe gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras so/ /tad+ya thA/ dz+wa le ma hA dz+wa le/ uk+ke/
muk+ke| a De a DA ba ti/ nr-i T+yo nr-i TA ba ti/ aT+Ti ni/ biT+Ti tsi T+Ti ni/ nr-i Ta Ti ni/ nr-iT+TA ba ti swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba ste/ gang gis chos smra ba 'di lta bu 'di dag dang 'gal bar bgyis na/
de de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'khus pa lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
bdag gis kyang chos smra ba de dag la glo ba brtse bas sman pa dang / bde ba dang / bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / spa ba'i slad du gzungs sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /
tad+ya thA/ aT+Ta/ naT+Te ta naT+Te/ a na te nA ti/ ku na Ti swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gis chos smra ba de dag la dpag
tshad brgya tshun chad du bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin cing / chos smra ba de dag la'ang bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur/ bde legs
su bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dri za bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ 'khor der 'dus par gyur
te 'dug pa de stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar
pa btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa/ chos smra ba 'di lta bu de dag bsrung ba
dang | bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i slad du gzungs sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ a ga No ga No/ gau ri gan+d+ha ri/ tsaN+Da li/ ma ting+ga/ puk+ka si/ ku
le| pru hi swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis gsungs te/ gang zhig chos smra ba
'di lta bu 'di dag dang 'gal bar bgyid na/ de dag thams cad la 'khus pa lags so/ /de nas srin mo 'phyang ma zhes bya ba dang / srin mo rnam par 'phyang ma zhes bya ba dang / srin
mo so brtsegs zhes bya ba dang / srin mo me tog so zhes bya ba dang / srin mo cod pan so zhes bya ba dang / srin mo sgra can zhes bya ba dang / srin mo me zhes bya ba dang / srin mo phreng ba
'chang zhes bya ba dang / srin mo mdung can zhes bya ba dang / srin mo sems can thams cad kyi mdangs 'phrog ces bya ba dang / 'phrog ma bu dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / srin
mo de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ srin mo de dag thams cad kyis sgra skad gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis kyang mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa chos smra ba 'di lta bu de dag bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / spa ba bgyi'o/ /bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/ /ci nas
tshes smra ba de dag la glags lta ba dang / skabs 'tshol ba dag gis kyang glags mi rnyed par bgyi'o/ /de nas srin mo de dag thams cad kyis sgra skad gcig tu tshig mthun par
bcom ldan 'das la gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag phul lo/ /tad+ya thA/ i ti me/ i ti me/ i ti me/ i ti me/ i ti me/ ni me/ ni me/ ni me/ ni me/ ni me/ ru he/ ru
he| ru he/ ru he/ ru he/ ha ste/ ha ste/ ha ste/ ha ste/ ha ste swAhA/ 'di spyi bor bzhag nas chos smra ba rnams la su'ang 'khu bar ma gyur cig /gnod
sbyin nam/ srin po'am/ yi dwags sam/ sha za'am/ srul po'am/ gshed byed dam/ ro langs sam/ rengs pa'am/ gnon po'am/ brjed byed kyi gzugs sam/ gnod
sbyin gyis byas pa'am/ mis byas pa'am/ mi ma yin pas byas pa'am/ rims nad nyin gcig pa'am/ nyin gnyis pa'am/ nyin gsum pa'am/ nyin bzhi pa'am/ rtag
pa'i rigs sam/ tha na rmi lam na'ang bud med kyi gzugs sam/ skyes pa'i gzugs sam/ khye'u'i gzugs sam/ bu mo'i gzugs kyis mtho 'tsham par 'gyur ba de ni gnas
ma mchis so/ /de nas srin mo de dag gis sgra skad gcig tu tshig mthun par bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /gang gis gsang sngags 'di thos nas//
chos smra ba dang 'gal bgyid pa/ /de'i mgo tshal ba bdun du 'gas/ /ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin/ /gang zhig chos smra 'gal bgyid pa/ /ma bsad pa yi 'gro gang dang / /pha
bsad 'gro ba gang lags pa'i/ /'gro ba de ni der mchi'o/ /gang zhig chos smra 'gal bgyid pa/ /til 'tshir dag gi 'gro gang dang / /til rdung 'gro ba gang lags pa'i//
'gro ba der ni de mchi'o/ /gang zhig chos smra 'gal bgyid pa/ /srang la g.yo bgyid 'gro gang dang / /bre 'chos 'gro ba gang lags pa'i/ /'gro ba der ni de mchi'o/ /de skad ces gsol
nas| mdung can la sogs pa srin mo de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis kyang chos smra ba 'di lta bu de dag la bsrung
bar bgyi'o/ /bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / dug gzhil bar bgyi'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis srin mo de dag la 'di skad
ces bka' stsal to/ /kye srin mo dag /legs so/ /legs so/ /khyed kyis chos smra ba de dag la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba gyis shig /gang dag tha na chos kyi rnam grangs
'di'i ming tsam 'dzin pa de dag la'ang mdung can khyod 'khor dang bcas pas bsrung bar bya na/ gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mtha' dag chub par 'dzin pa dang / glegs bam
du byas te rim gro byed pa dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i bdan dang /
'bru mar gyi mar me'am/ mar gyi mar me'am/ spos mar gyi mar me'am/ tsam+pa ka'i mar gyi mar me'am/ bar sha ka'i mar gyi mar me'am/ ut+pa la'i mar gyi mar me'am/ sna
ma'i mar gyi mar me'am/ de lta bu'i mchod pa'i yo byad rnam pa mang po brgya stong gis rim gro byed pa lta ci smos te/ mdung can khyod g.yog dang
bcas pas bsrung bar bya'o/ /gzungs sngags kyi le'u 'di bshad pa na srog chags drug khri brgyad stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /dam pa'i chos
pad+ma dkar po las/ gzungs sngags kyi le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
sman gyi rgyal po 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na rgyu ba dang / bcom ldan 'das 'di dka' ba bgyid pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag gda'/ bcom ldan
'das/ gang thos pas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma
yin pa rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po 'di dag gis thos nas thams
cad dga' mgu rangs shing yid bde bar 'gyur ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po'i spyod pa gang ci lags pa'i phyogs tsam zhig /de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis legs par bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pas gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun
tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha
lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams gyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ skar ma'i rgyal po me tog
kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal de'i byang chub
sems dpa' bye ba brgyad cu'i 'dus pa chen po byung ngo / /gang+gA'i klung bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi nyan thos 'dus pa byung ngo / /de'i bstan pa la
bud med med par gyur to/ /sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi dwags dang / lha ma yin gyi ris med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang lag mthil ltar
mnyam la nyams dga' bar gyur to/ /lha'i bai DUR+ya las grub pa'i sa phyogs rin po che dang tsan+dan gyi shing ljon pas brgyan cing / rin po che'i dra bas bres pa/ dar gyi lda ldi
mngon par rab tu dpyangs pa/ rin po che'i bog phor nas bdug bas bdugs pa/ rin po che'i shing ljon pa'i drung thams cad na/ rin po che'i mkha' rten mda' rgyang gang
gi tshad tsam byas pa yod pa/ rin po che'i mkha' rten thams cad kyi steng na lha'i bu bye ba brgya dag /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ sil snyan byed cing pheg rdob pa dang / rol mo'i sgra 'byin cing 'khod do/ /bcom ldan 'das de'ang
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba las brtsams te dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di/ nyan
thos chen po de dag dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la rgyas par rab tu ston to/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal de'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bzhi khri nyis stong du gyur to/ /byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang nyan thos chen po de dag gi tshe'i tshad kyang de tsam du gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams
cad kyis mthong na dga' ba de'ang / bcom ldan 'das de'i gsung rab la dka' ba byed pa la brtson par gyur te/ de lo khri nyis stong du 'chag pa la zhugs shing brtson 'grus
chen po brtsams pas rnal 'byor la brtson par gyur to/ /de lo khri nyis stong 'das nas gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob ste/ ting nge
'dzin de thob ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba de tshim zhing mgu ste yi rangs nas rab tu dga' zhing dga'
ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ de'i tshe 'di snyam du sems te/ dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la brten nas gzungs thams cad yang dag par ston pa zhes
bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin bdag gis thob bo snyam mo/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na
dga' ba de'ang 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla dri ma med pa'i 'od dpal dang /
dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod par bya'o snyam nas/ de'i tshe de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de'i mod la steng gi bar snang las me tog man+dA ra dang man+dA
ra chen po'i lha'i me tog gi char chen po mngon par bab bo/ /dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i tsan+dan gyi sprin ces te/ tsan+dan sprul gyi snying po'i char chen po mngon par bab ste/ skar
ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa de lta bu'i spos kyi rnam pa zho gnyis kyi rin du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dis mi chog go /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog
kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du ting nge
'dzin de las langs so/ /langs nas 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar lus yongs su btang ba ltar ni rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas pa ma yin
no snyam mo/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba de
de'i tshe/ a ga ru dang / du ru ka dang / pog gi khu ba za zhing tsam+pa ka'i mar yang 'thung ngo / /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ rnam grangs 'dis byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba rtag tu spos za zhing tsam+pa ka'i mar 'thung bas lo bcu gnyis 'das par gyur to/ /skar ma'i rgyal
po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par shes pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba lo bcu gnyis po de 'das nas
rang gi lus lha'i ras kyis kun tu dkris nas 'bru mar gyis zhen par byas te bdag gi byin gyi rlabs byas so/ /bdag gis byin gyi rlabs byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
dang / dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod pa'i las kyi phyir bdag gi lus la me 'bar bar byas so/ /skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon
par shes pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba'i lus kyi mar me 'bar ba
