des de la mu tig gi phreng ba rin brgya stong ri ba phul ba dang / des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ nga'i tshig gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya
thub pa la phul cig /de nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas chos smra ba de'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag btsal te song ngo / /rnyed par bya ba rnyed cing bsam pa yongs su rdzogs nas dze ta'i
tshal gyi gtsug lag khang gang la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhabs la phyag btsal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis rnyed pa rnyed dam/ bcom ldan 'das/ de
bzhin te/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen pa bzhin no/ /de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun tshogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis
gzungs sngags 'di gsungs so/ /na maHsap+ta nAM/ saM mya k+saM bud+d+ha ko Ti nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsa le tsun+de swAhA/ gzungs sngags 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun
cu rtsa bdun gyis gsungs so/ /ba spu'i khung bu de 'das nas nyi ma'i 'od ces bya ba'i ba spu'i khung bu de na byang chub sems dpa' bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong du
ma gnas te/ nyi ma'i 'od ces bya ba'i ba spu'i khung bu de na gser gyi ri khri yod de/ ri re re zhing yang rtse mo nyi khri nyis stong yod la/ ri de re re'i dos ni rin po che pad+ma rA gas brgyan/
ngos re re zhing yang lha'i nor bu rin po che'i skyed mos tshal shin tu mdzes pa/ shin tu dga' bar byed pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang lha'i rdzing bus brgyan pa/ khang pa brtsegs ma brgya
phrag stong du ma ni lha'i gser dang rin po che las byas shing mu tig dang dar gyi lnga ldi ni bres/ mu tig gi se mo do brgya dag ni 'phyang ngo / /khang pa brtsegs ma de'i nang na yid bzhin
gyi nor bu rin po che sha ri da ka yod pas ni byang chub sems dpa' de dag la yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed do/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag khang pa brtsegs
ma der 'gro'o/ /der song nas kyang yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags kyang rjes su dran no/ /gang gi tshe na rjes su dran pa de'i tshe mya ngan las 'da' ba rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /mya ngan las 'da'
ba'i sa de la de bzhin gshegs pa bdun mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po de'ang mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang sems dad pa skyed
do| |bskyed nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag khang pa brtsegs ma de nas 'byung ngo / /byung nas kha cig ni 'chag sar 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i skyed
mos tshal du 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni rdzing bu dag tu 'gro'o/ /kha cig ni nor bu rin po che pad+ma rA ga'i ri'i ngos la 'gro'o/ /dong nas skyil mo klung bcas lus drang por bsrangs te dran pa mngon
par bzhag nas 'khod do/ /rigs kyi bu/ ba spu'i khung bu de na byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu dag gnas so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de 'das nas dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ba spu'i khung bu de
na byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa brgya phrag stong du ma gnas te/ dbang po'i rgyal po'i ba spu'i khung bu de na lha'i gser gyi ri brgyad khri yod do/ /ri de dag gi dbus na nor bu rin
po che me tog pad+ma ltar snang ba zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' de dag sems par gyur pa de'i tshe de dag gi bsam pa grub par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar byang chub sems
dpa' de dag ri'i rgyal po de la gnas shing zas dang skom gyi dran pa mi sgom mo/ /de dag 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gzir bar yang mi 'gyur ro/ /de dag 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gos
par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /dus thams cad du mya ngan las 'das pa la sems shing gnas kyi/ de dag gi lus la gzhan sems pa med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de 'das nas sman chen po zhes bya
ba'i ba spu'i khung bu de na byang chub sems dpa' sems thog ma bskyed pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong du gnas so/ /rigs kyi bu/ ba spu'i khung bu de na
ri dgu khri yod de/ la la ni rdo rje'i'o/ /la la ni dngul gyi'o/ /la la ni gser gyi'o/ /la la ni nor bu rin po che in+d+ra nI la'i'o/ /la la ni pad+ma rA ga'i'o/ /la la ni ma ra ga ta'i'o/ /la
la ni shel gyi'o/ /ri'i rgyal po de lta bu dag yod do/ /ri re re zhing yang rtse mo brgyad khri yod de/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ shin tu mdzes par byas pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa
yid du 'ong ba dag go /rtse mo de dag la dri za dag gnas te/ de dag dus thams cad du ba spu'i khung bu nas sil snyan 'byung ba 'dzin to/ /gang sems thog ma bskyed pa'i byang chub
sems dpa' de dag kyang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa la sems te/ kye ma'o/ /sdug bsngal lo/ /skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba sdug bsngal lo/ /sdug
cing mdza' ba dang bral zhing / mi sdug cing mi mdza' ba dang phrad pa ni sdug bsngal lo/ /bstir med par skyes pa ni sdug bsngal lo/ /thig nag po 'debs par skyes pa ni sdug
bsngal lo/ /sems can yi dwags kyi grong khyer du skyes pa rnams ni sdug bsngal lo zhes de lta bu'i lus la skyo ba dag bsams nas de'i tshe skyil mo krung bcas te/ lus drang por
bsrangs nas dran pa mngon par bzhag ste ri de dag la gnas so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de 'das nas sna tshogs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ba spu'i khung bu de na rang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya
phrag stong du ma gnas te/ de dag ni 'bar ba dang / gdung ba dang / char 'bebs pa dang / glog gtong ba'i cho 'phrul dag byed de/ ba spu'i khung bu de na ri'i rgyal po brgya phrag stong dag yod
do| |ri'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'o/ /ri'i rgyal po de dag la shing dpag bsam rnam pa sna tshogs par yod do/ /sdong po ni mu tig dmar po dang /
lo ma ni gser dang / dngul las byas pa'o/ /rin po che rnam pa du ma dang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag ni 'phyang ngo / /cod pan dang / rna cha dang / phreng ba'i chun po dang / dpung rgyan dang /
se mo do dang / se mo do phyed pa dag kyang rab tu 'phyang ngo / /yul ka shi ka nas byung ba'i gos dag kyang rab tu 'phyang ngo / /gser dang dngul gyi dril bu dag kyang sgra sil sil grag ste/ de
'dra ba'i ri'i rgyal po de dag la rang sangs rgyas de dag gnas te/ mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng
gzhi dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / de lta bu 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / chos gtan la dbab pa bstan pa'i gtam rnam pa
du ma dag phan tshun du smra ste/ de'i tshe sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba ba spu'i khung bu de 'das nas thams cad kyi tha ma na ba spu'i khung bu rgyal mtshan gyi
rgyal po zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ ba spu'i khung bu de na'ang dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do/ /ba spu'i khung bu de na ri brgyad khri bzhi stong yod de/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis
brgyan pa yid du 'ong ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa'o/ /ri'i rgyal po de la shing dpag bsam brgya phrag stong du ma yod do/ /tsan+dan gyi shing brgya phrag stong du ma yod do/ /byu ru'i shing brgya
phrag stong du ma dag yod do/ /ba spu'i khung bu de nas ni rdo rje las byas pa'o/ /ba spu'i khung bu de na gser dang rin po che las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs ma dgu khri dgu stong yod de/ mu
tig dang dar gyi lda ldi ni bres/ mu tig gi se mo do ni dpyangs/ dril bu'i phreng ba ni dpyangs/ zla ba bzhin du bzang ba'i rin po ches ni snang bar byas te/ khang pa brtsegs ma de na
gser gyi skas rin po ches yongs su spras pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa dga' bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /khang pa brtsegs ma de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dzam+bu'i gling du
mngon par phyogs shing chos 'chad pa'ang bzhugs te/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug bstan pa ston par mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa ston
par mdzad/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan par mdzad/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa ston par mdzad/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa ston
par mdzad/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa ston par mdzad/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa ston par mdzad de/ de ltar de dag dzam+bu'i gling na gnas pa'i mi
rnams la chos rnam pa sna tshogs dag dus dus su 'chad do/ /de ltar rigs kyi bu de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i ba spu'i
khung bu de dag dze ta'i tshal gyi gtsug lag khang du phyin pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang /
dbang phyug chen po dang / mthu bo che la sogs te lha'i bu tshogs pa dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong du ma dag gis mthong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan
'das la sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ba spu'i khung bu gzhan dag mchis sam ma mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de 'das nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bo de las mtsho chen po bzhi
'byung ste/ gting dpog mi nus so/ /gang gi tshe na rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bo las chu 'byung ba de'i tshe rta rgod ma'i gdong lta bur 'bab ste/ de'i tshe thal ba'i
phung por 'gro'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i byin gyi rlabs ni de 'dra'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la sgrib
pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ba spu'i khung bu de'ang ma mchis pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs
kyi bu| de'ang med pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan
ras gzigs kyi dbang po mchi'am/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po ni dze ta'i tshal gyi
gtsug lag khang 'di nyid du nga la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / dbang phyug chen po rgyu dang bcas te lung bstan pa'i phyir 'ong ngo / /de nas byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / shel gyi kha dog
dang | dngul gyi kha dog btang nas kha dog de dag dze ta'i tshal gyi gtsug lag khang du song ngo / /song nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor te/ bstir med pa'i sems can
dmyal ba chen por song ngo / /song nas bstir med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po bsil bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe dze ta'i tshal gyi gtsug lag khang du ltas bzang po byung bar gyur
pa dze ta'i tshal gyi gtsug lag khang de lha'i gser rin po cher snang bar gyur te/ dze ta'i tshal gyi gtsug lag khang de ltar snang ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams nas byung ste/ dze ta'i tshal gyi gtsug lag khang ga la ba de logs su song nas rim gyis dze ta'i tshal gyi gtsug lag
khang ga la ba der phyin to/ /de nas dze ta'i tshal gyi gtsug lag khang du song ba dang / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bya ka la ping+ka'i dbyangs kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod
ngal lam/ khyod nyon mongs sam/ khyod kyis sems can yongs su smin par byas sam/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras
gzigs kyi dbang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar bka' stsal pa bzhin te/ bdag gis de lta bu'i las kyis bsgrubs so/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis rigs kyi bu gang khyod kyis de 'dra ba'i las kyis bsgrubs pa legs so/ /legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos bcom ldan 'das la me tog pad+ma phul nas/ bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas pas me tog pad+ma 'di
dag gsol te bsnyung ba ma mchis sam/ 'o brgyal ba ma mchis sam/ bzhengs pa yang ngam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes kyang gsung ngo zhes smras nas/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bzhes te g.yon phyogs su bzhag go /de nas lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
bos phyag btsal te 'di skad ces gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis lung ston pa'i bshad pa thob par mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
song zhig dang / khyod la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos lung ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po song ste/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rkang pa la phyag btsal nas spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dbang phyug chen po chos 'dzin pa/
pad+ma'i zhal/ pad+ma la dgyes pa/ phyag na me tog pad+ma bzang po mnga' ba/ pad+ma'i dpal dang ldan pa/ yongs su bskor ba/ 'gro ba dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa/ sa'i spyan mchog
mdzad pa/ sim par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes lha'i bu dbang phyug chen pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la de ltar
bstod nas kha rog ste 'dug pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos dbang phyug chen po de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs
kyi bu khyod ci'i phyir kha rog ste 'dug /de nas lha'i bu dbang phyug chen pos 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub tu lung bstan pa stsal du
gsol/ de nas spyan ras gzigs kyis gsungs pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod 'jig rten gyi khams phye ba zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas/ rigs pa dang rkang par ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das dbang phyug ces bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha mo u ma song nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rkang pa la mgo
bos phyag btsal nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la bstod par rtsom pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po chen po/ srog sbyin par mdzad pa/ sa'i spyan mchog mdzad pa/ pad+ma bzang po phyag na mnga' ba/ pad+ma'i dpal dang ldan pa/ yongs
su bskor ba/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sa ston pa/ legs par dgongs pa mdzad pa/ chos 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes de ltar lha mo u mas byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la bstod de gsol pa/ bud med kyi lus smad pa las bdag yongs su thar par mdzad du gsol/ mngal na gnas shing sha ma
gang ba'i sdug bsngal ba dang / rtag tu 'dzin pa las bdag yongs su thar par mdzad du gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang
pos de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sring mo khyod 'jig rten gyi khams gangs kyi ri'i g.yas phyogs kyi ngos su u ma'i dbang phyug ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang rkang par ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang
mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha mo u mas lung bstan pa thob bo/ /ltos shig /sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel
ba| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/ dbang phyug
chen po'i le'u 'di'ang bshad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang
po mchis te/ long ba dag gis ni mig thob bo/ /de ring bdag ni tshe'i 'bras bu mchis par gyur to/ /bdag de ring ni bsam pa bzhin du grub bo/ /bdag de ring ni bsam pa yongs
su rdzogs so/ /bdag de ring ni byang chub kyi lam la bar chad ma mchis par gyur to/ /legs par dgongs pa chos kyi sku mya ngan las 'das pa ston to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la
yang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ring bdag la spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i yon tan gyi bye brag bshad du gsol/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ri'i rgyal po khor yug dang / khor yug chen po dang / ri'i rgyal po mu tsi lin da dang /
ri'i rgyal po nag po dang / nag po chen po dang / ri'i rgyal po gsus shol dang / ri'i rgyal po mi ston pa dang / ri'i rgyal po thams cad du gtogs pa dang /
ri'i rgyal po 'bar ba'i kha dang / ri'i rgyal po rtse mo brgya pa dang / ri'i rgyal po khang pa dang / ri'i rgyal po nor bu rin po che chen po dang / ri'i rgyal po ston pa dang / ri'i rgyal po dus ma
yin par ston pa dang / ri'i rgyal po de dag srang gcig la btab na/ rigs kyi bu/ ngas ri'i rgyal po de dag srang 'di snyed cig go zhes sam/ srang brgya'o zhes sam/ srang stong ngo
zhes sam/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong zhes sam/ grangs su'ang / char yang / bgrang bar yang nus kyi/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan
ras gzigs kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ni bgrang mi nus so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rdul phra rab kyi tshad ni ngas bgrang nus kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i bsod nams kyi tshogs ni ngas bgrang bar mi nus so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho mching rnam chen po ni ngas thigs
pa re re nas bgrang nus kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i bsod nams kyi tshogs ni bgrang mi nus so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste
dper na/ shing shir Sha'i tshal ni ngas 'dab ma re re nas bgrang nus kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i bsod nams kyi tshogs ni
bgrang bar mi nus so/ /sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ri rab ri'i rgyal po ni gro ga'i phung por gyur/ rgya mtsho mching rnam chen po ni snag tshar gyur/
gling chen po bzhi na gnas pa'i skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo de dag thams cad ni yi ge par gyur te/ ri'i rgyal po mtha' yas mu med pa yi ger bris kyang yi ge
'brum bu re re nas bgrang nus kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i bsod nams kyi tshogs ni bgrang mi nus so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di
lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma phrag bcu gnyis dang mnyam pa'i na bza' dang / bshos dang /
mal stan dang / na ba'i rkyen gyi sman gyi yo byad thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la bsnyen bkur byas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i
bsod nams kyi phung po de ni/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i skra'i nyag ma gcig gi rtse mo la gnas pa'i bsod
nams dang mnyam mo/ /sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang
po ni ting nge 'dzin brgya phrag du ma dang ldan te/ 'di lta ste/ rab tu 'joms zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyan par byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyan par mi byed ces
bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / glog gi spyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bzod par byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzi can chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam

par byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dam pa sbyin byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mthu brgya pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
bkod pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spobs pa'i phung po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal po'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa mang po
zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje'i sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtag tu dam pa sbyin byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang po yongs su thar byed ces bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin dang / zhe sdang yongs su thar byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang po dam pa'i mig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyin byed dam pa'i mig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

dang / chos la mngon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje mngal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shin tu ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mya ngan 'da' byed ces bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin dang / 'od zer mtha' yas sgrub ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnal 'byor byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dzam+bu'i gling gi dam
pa'i mig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi dam pa'i mig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bya ba byas pa la mngon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / skye dgu'i gnas
zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi zad par byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bstir med skem zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgya mtsho ltar zab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
'khor brgya pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po ni ting nge 'dzin de dag dang ldan no/ /sgrib
pa thams cad rnam par sel ba/ 'di lta ste/ log par dad sel ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rig pa dang rkang par ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/
skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ba de'i tshe de'i dus na nga byang chub sems dpar gyur te/ de'i
tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spyan sngar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i yon tan brjod pa de lta bu ngas
thos so/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sogs pa dang 'di 'dra bar ting nge 'dzin gyis 'gyed pa'ang ngas mthong ngo / /gang gi tshe na kun tu bzang po rdo rje gyen du 'phags
pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs so/ /gang gi
tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po zla ba dam pa'i mig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po nyi ma dam pa'i mig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs so/ /gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu
bzang po byugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin la zhugs so/ /gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po rnam par byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa de'i tshe byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po rdo rje'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs so/ /gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po kun tu bzang po dbang po'i 'gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po rgya mtsho ltar
zab ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs so/ /gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po seng ge glal ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa de'i tshe
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po seng ge rnam par rol ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs so/ /gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dam pa sbyin par byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang
po bstir med pa skem zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs so/ /gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po ba spu'i khung bu thams cad 'byed par byed
pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'ang ba spu'i khung bu thams cad 'byed par byed nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po kun tu bzang pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po khyod kyi spobs
pa de 'dra ba legs so/ /legs so zhes smras so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa log par dad sel gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la
'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i spobs pa cung zad cig mthong du zad de/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i spobs pa ci 'dra ba de lta bu ni de bzhin gshegs pa dag la'ang mi mnga'o zhes ngas log par dad
sel las de skad thos so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ theg pa chen po'i mdo'i
rgyal po za ma tog bkod pa bshad du gsol/ de'i slad du bdag cag chos kyi ros ngoms shing dga' bar bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi
bu| gang dag theg pa chen po'i mdo'i rgyal po za ma tog bkod pa'i ming thos pa de dag la sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa med do/ /gang dag pha rol gyi bud med la chags shing zhen
ba'i las la brtson pa dang / gang pha dang ma gsod pa dang / dgra bcom pa gsod pa dang / mchod rten 'joms pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin pa dang /
de lta bu'i sdig pa la dga' ba dag la'ang theg pa chen po'i mdo'i rgyal po za ma tog bkod pas sdig pa las thar bar byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la sgrib pa thams cad
rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis ji ltar theg pa chen po'i mdo za ma tog bkod pa sdig pa thams cad las thar bar bgyid pa 'tshal
bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ ri rab ri'i rgyal po'i g.yas phyogs kyi ngos la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas drug gis dri ma dang dri ma
med pa'i mthar brtags pa yod de/ da ltar ngas kyang brtags so/ /gang gos dkar po sngon por 'gyur ba dang / gang gos sngon po dkar por 'gyur ba ni/ gang gos dkar po de
sngon por 'gyur ba de ni sdig pa'i phung por blta'o/ /gang gos sngon po de dkar por 'gyur ba de ni chos kyi phung por blta'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po'i mdo'i
rgyal po za ma tog bkod pa de ni sdig pa thams cad sreg cing dkar por byed do/ /sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dbyar gyi dus kyi tshe rtswa dang nags tshal
dag shin tu sngo bar 'gyur te/ de nas klu'i rgyal po kha brgya pa zhes bya ba gnas nas langs te/ rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal
dag sreg par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po'i mdo'i rgyal po za ma tog bkod pa 'di ni sdig pa thams cad sreg par byed do/ /gang theg pa chen po'i mdo'i
rgyal po thos pa'i sems can de dag ni bde ba dang ldan pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ de dag ni so so'i skye bo ma yin par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa
dang 'dra bar blta'o/ /de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa bcu gnyis gshegs te/ rigs kyi bu/ ma 'jigs shig /ma 'jigs shig /khyod kyis theg pa chen
po'i mdo'i rgyal po thos so/ /khyod slar 'khor bar mi 'khor bar 'gyur ro/ /slar skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /'ga' zhig 'dod pa
dang phrad la mi dga' zhing mi 'dod pa dang phrad par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song zhing de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas
pa las dam pa'i chos thos par 'gyur ro zhes dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar sems can de dag bde bar mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu song ngo / /de nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
sel ba cang mi zer bar 'dug go /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag
thams cad kyang dong ngo / /gang gi tshe na de dag dong ba de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gi bslab
pa'i sdom pa bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gang dag bsnyen par rdzogs par byed 'dod pa des thog ma kho nar song ste/ sna tshogs pa dag gi
gnas brtag par bya'o/ /brtags nas dge slong dag la/ btsun pa/ sna tshogs kyi gnas ni dag ste/ sna tshogs kyi gnas de na rus pa'ang ma mchis so/ /bshang gci'ang ma
mchis te/ sna tshogs kyi gnas de ni yongs su dag go /dge slong dag kyang bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyir rung ngo zhes sbran to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshul khrims
dang mi ldan pas ni bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bya'o/ /gsol ba dang bzhi pa'ang sbyin par mi bya'o/ /bar gyi gsol ba'ang mi bya'o/ /mang du bshad ci dgos te/ dge slong dag /tshul
khrims dang mi ldan pa'i dge slong gis ni sna tshogs kyis gnas su'ang 'gro bar mi bya na gsol ba dang bzhi pa bya ba lta ci smos te/ de dag ni ston pa'i
bstan pa 'jig par byed pa'o/ /tshul khrims dang mi ldan pa de dag ni sbyin gnas dag gi nang du gnas sbyin par mi bya'o/ /de dag ni gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol tu gnas su
gzhug ste/ de dag la dge 'dun gyi zas kyang mi sbyin no/ /de dag la dge 'dun gyis yang 'os pa ma yin no/ /de dag la ni dge slong gi dngos po cung zad kyang med do/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang gi tshe na de 'dra ba'i sbyin gnas dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga mya ngan las 'das nas lo sum brgya na de 'dra ba'i sbyin gnas dag 'byung ste/ gang gtsug lag khang la khyim du 'du shes par 'dzin pa de dag ni bu pho
dang / bu mo dag gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag ni dge 'dun gyi khri dang / khri'u dang / tshad thur dang / sngas dang / mal stan dag la spyod par ma 'os pa la spyod
par byed do/ /dge 'dun dag gi nye bar spyod pa la bshang ba dang gci bar byed do/ /mchil ma dag kyang 'dor zhing las kyi rnam par smin pa mi shes so/ /gang dge 'dun gyi nye
bar spyod pa la mchil ma 'dor ba de dag ni lo bcu gnyis su shing sA la'i tshal du kha khab kyi mig tsam gyi srog chags su skye'o/ /gang dge 'dun gyi so shing la spyod du ma 'os pa la
spyod pa de dag ni rus sbal dang / chu srin dang / nya'i nang du skye'o/ /gang dge 'dun gyi til dang / 'bras dang / rgya shug dang / ku lan tha la sogs pa gang spyod par ma 'os pa la spyod
pa de dag ni yi dwags kyi grong khyer du skye ste/ mgal ba 'dra zhing keng rus bsgreng ba lta bu bdag gi skra dang spus khebs pa/ kha khab kyi mig tsam du gyur pa'i sdug bsngal de dag lus
la myong bar 'gyur ro/ /gang dge 'dun gyi zas kyis khyi gso bar byed pa de dag ni rigs dma' bar skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang po nyams par 'gyur ro/ /sgur po dang / khyor por skye'o//
gzhan gyi bzhin la blta zhing slong mo byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas shi 'phos nas kyang nad bu can du 'gyur ro/ /lus las rnag dang khrag 'dzag par 'gyur ro/ /chu ba rnams 'khums
par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe na langs pa de na sha rnams sa la lhags shing rus pa rnams snang bar 'gyur te/ de ltar de dag lo mang por/ lo brgya stong mang por lus kyi sdug bsngal
myong bar 'gyur ro/ /gang dge 'dun gyi sa la mi 'os par spyod pa de dag ni bskal pa bcu gnyis su 'o dod 'bod pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skye ste/ lcags kyi thu lum
bsregs pa khar bcug nas mchu dang so dag kyang lhags/ rkan yang gas/ mgul pa'ang tshig /snying dang rgyu ma dag kyang thams cad du thams cad tshig
nas rus pa'i lhag ma lus par 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /de'i tshe las kyi rlung langs nas shi nas kyang slar 'tsho'o/ /de nas slar yang gshin rje skyong ba'i skyes bus bzung ngo / /
de nas de dag gi las bdag gir bya ba'i las kyi dbang gis lce chen po 'byung bar 'gyur zhing lce de'i steng du gshol brgya stong gis rmo bar 'gyur te/ de ltar lo brgya phrag stong du
sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas shi 'phos nas me'i rdza ma'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes te/ de nas gshin rje skyong ba'i skyes bu dag
gis bzung nas lce de nyid la khab brgya stong gis 'bigs par byed do/ /de nas kyang las kyi dbang gis sos nas me'i 'obs su 'dor ro/ /me'i 'obs de nas kyang phyung nas
chu bo bre'i ta ra ni chen por 'dor ro/ /de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sems can dmyal ba gzhan dag tu skyes te/ de ltar 'khyam pa las bskal pa gsum zad nas shi 'phos
te dzam+bu'i gling du dbul po dang / dmus long gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ de lta bas na dge 'dun dag gi rdzas ni bsrung bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag /gang bslab pa
sdom pas chos gos gsum bcang bar bya ste/ chos gos gcig ni dge 'dun la yid brtan cing dge 'dun gyis spyad pa'i phyir ro/ /chos gos gnyis pa ni rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro
ba'i phyir ro/ /chos gos gsum pa ni grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong 'dab dang / ye 'ur 'khod pa dang / tshong 'dus dag gi phyir te/ dge slong dag gis chos gos de gsum
bcang bar bya'o/ /gang tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / yon tan dang ldan pa'i dge slong dag gis ni ngas bslab tshigs bcas pa 'di gzung bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag /dge 'dun
gyi rdzas la spyod par mi 'os pa dag gis ni yongs su spyad par mi bya'o/ /dge 'dun gyi ni me'i 'obs lta bu'o/ /dge 'dun gyi ni dug lta bu'o/ /dge 'dun gyi ni rdo rje lta bu'o/ /dge 'dun
gyi ni khur lta bu'o/ /dug la ni gnyen po bya nus kyi/ dge 'dun gyi la ni gnyen po bya mi nus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i bslab tshigs la dge slong gang dag 'dzin par bgyid pa ni so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa lags so/ /'dul ba la mngon par
lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi bslab tshigs kyi rjes su bsrungs pa lags so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te
song ngo / /de nas nyan thos chen po de dag bdag bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dong ngo / /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / nam mkha' lding
dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag kyang dong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / thams cad dang ldan
pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga'o/ /'phags pa
za ma tog bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de ye shes
sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+Ya rat+na ka raN+Da nA ma mahA yA sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkon mchog gi za ma tog
ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan
yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'khri dang
thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das smig ma'i ldum bu'i 'khor gyi khyams na 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston
to/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong dang lhan cig tu brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing
mdun du bdar te/ smig ma'i ldum bu'i 'khor gyi khyams ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
phyag btsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams dang lhan
cig tu phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ da ltar
ci'i bka' mchid cig mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das/ bka' mchid de nyid kyi rjes rgyun mi 'chad par mdzad du gsol/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'jam
dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ da ltar ni nyan thos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad na/ 'jam dpal/ bdag gis khyod la bskul gyi/ byang
chub sems dpa' dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid brtsam par khyod spobs par gyis shig /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ nyan thos
dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' dang ldan pa'i gtam gyi snod du gyur pa ma yin na/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' dang ldan pa'i gtam
cir dgos/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ 'dir gang snod du gyur pa 'byung ba de dag la khyod kyis shod cig /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
'di na snod du gyur pa ni gang dag yin/ snod du ma gyur pa ni gang dag yin shes sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ bdag ni gzhan gyi sgra'i rjes su 'brang
ba yin pas snod dang snod ma yin pa lta ci shes mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'jam dpal khyod byang chub sems dpa' dang ldan pa'i gtam brtsam par spobs par gyis shig /'jam
dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ gang su dag skyon med pa la zhugs pa de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du ma gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa rab
'byor/ gang dag skyon med pa la'ang rtog cing sems can rnams la'ang blta la/ skyon med par yang mi ltung zhing skyon dang yang lhan cig mi gnas pa de dag ni sangs rgyas
kyi chos rnams kyi snod du gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ gzhan yang gang dag mtshams la gnas par gyur pa/ slob pa dang mi slob pa'i chos la zhugs pa/ sems can thams
cad la btang snyoms pa/ srid pa la me 'bar ba lta bur lta ba/ yid yongs su skyo ba/ khams gsum thams cad kyis skrag pa/ skad cig tsam yang srid pa mngon par 'grub par mi
dga' ba de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du ma gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ gang dag phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa bye bar go cha bgos pa/ srid pa thams cad kyis mi
'jigs mi dngang ba/ khams gsum spyod yul ba/ dri ma gsum dang bral ba/ 'khor ba la skyed mos tshal dang gzhal med khang du 'du shes pa/ srid pa 'dod cing srid pa thams
cad la chags pa dang bral ba de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ gzhan yang gang dag 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang /
bag la nyal ba dang / kun tu dkris te 'dug pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du ma gyur pa'o/ /btsun
pa rab 'byor/ gang dag 'dod chags kyis chags pa'ang ma yin la 'dod chags spyod par yang ston pa/ zhe sdang gis sdang ba'ang ma yin la zhe sdang spyod par yang ston pa/ gti mug
gis rmongs pa'ang ma yin la gti mug spyod pa'ang ston pa/ nyon mongs pa dang yang bral la khams gsum du'ang snang ba/ sems can thams cad la
byams pa/ ma khengs pa/ ma zhum pa/ sems can thams cad kyi khur khyer ba/ de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su song ba/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir
zhugs pa/ rig pa gsum dang ldan pa/ rig pa mngon du gyur ba de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du gyur pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ gal te
chos kyi dbyings kyang gcig /de bzhin nyid kyang gcig /yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gcig na snod dam snod ma yin pa de ji ltar mngon/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab
'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rdza mkhan gyis 'jim pa'i gong bu gcig las snod rnam pa sna tshogs byas te/ snod de thams cad so gcig tu btang na/ de la kha cig ni 'bru
mar dang mar gyi snod du gyur/ kha cig ni sbrang rtsi dang li kha ra'i snod du gyur/ kha cig ni ngan pa mi gtsang ba'i snod du 'gyur te/ 'jim pa'i gong bu de dang so btang ba la ni tha dad pa
cung zad kyang med do/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyang gcig /de bzhin nyid kyang gcig /yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gcig mod kyi/ ji ltar las mngon
par 'du byas pa bzhin du snod kyi khyad par du 'gyur ro/ /de la sbrang rtsi dang / li kha ra'i snod ji lta ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la blta'o/ /'bru mar dang mar gyi snod
ji lta ba de bzhin du nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la blta'o/ /ngan pa mi gtsang ba'i snod ji lta ba de bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad la blta'o/ /rab 'byor gyis smras
pa/ 'jam dpal/ rnam grangs gang gis gang dag snod du gyur pa de dag snod ma yin par 'gyur pa dang / gang dag snod ma yin pa de dag snod du gyur pa'i rnam grangs yod dam/ 'jam
dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ yod do/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ rnam grangs gang gis na gang dag snod du gyur pa de dag snod ma yin par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag
snod ma yin pa de dag snod du gyur pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ gang la la nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi snod du gyur pa bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba ma
bcom pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du ma gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ gang dag nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi snod du ma gyur ba bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba
bcom pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du gyur pa'o/ /rab 'byor smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ snod du ci zhig gzhug par bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab
'byor/ ci'ang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' gzhug pa med pa dang / dbyung ba med pa la spyod pa de'i tshe snod kyi snying por rig
par bya'o/ /gang gi tshe gzhug pa dang / dbyung ba la spyod pa de'i tshe snod chag par rig par bya'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' ni rtswa dang / shing gel pa
dang | sman dang / nags tshal thams cad kyi snod ces kyang bya la/ gang gi snod kyang ma yin no/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sangs rgyas kyi chos
thams cad kyi snod ces kyang bya la/ gang gi snod kyang ma yin no/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sa las skyes pa'i shing rnams ni snod nam mkha' yin pas rnam
par skye'o/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ de bzhin du lhag pa'i bsam pa las skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rnams kyang snod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin pas rnam par skye'o/ /
rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ci byang chub sems dpa' rnam par skye'am/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ gal te nam mkha' rnam par skye na/
de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang rnam par skye ba zhig na/ nam mkha' ni rnam par skye ba'am/ yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur te/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ de bzhin du
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang rnam par skye bar yang mi 'gyur/ yongs su nyams par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
rnam par skye bar yang mi 'gyur/ yongs su nyams par yang mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ci las bsams te de skad smras/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nyon mongs pa rnam par skye bar yang
mi 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las yongs su nyams par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ nyon mongs pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
rnams la tha dad du bya ba ci yod/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ nyon mongs pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la tha dad par bya ba ni cung zad kyang med
do| |btsun pa rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi 'od kyis reg na gzugs thams cad 'di lta ste/ gser gyi kha dog tu kha dog gcig par 'gyur ro/ /btsun
pa rab 'byor/ de bzhin du shes rab dang ye shes kyi snang bar byas pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyang 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi kha dog tu kha dog gcig par 'gyur ro/ /
btsun pa rab 'byor/ de bas na shes rab dang ye shes kyis snang bar byas pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la ni tha dad pa cung zad kyang med de/ de bas na
chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ci'i phyir na chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bya/
'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ji lta ba bzhin zhes bya bas ci zhig bstan
par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ thog ma ji lta bar tha mar yang de bzhin du de bzhin nyid las phyir mi ldog pas de'i phyir ji lta ba bzhin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis smras
pa| 'jam dpal/ thog ma dang tha ma zhes bya bas ci zhig bstan par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ thog ma ni stong pa nyid/ tha ma ni dben pa nyid de de bas na thog ma dang
tha ma zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ stong pa nyid dang / dben pa nyid la tha dad du bya ba ci yod/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ 'di
ji snyam du sems/ gser dang sa le spram la tha dad du bya ba yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ming du btags pa la ni tha dad pa yod do/ /'jam dpal gyis
smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid dang / dper pa nyid 'di ni ming dang brda tsam du zad de/ ming dang brda la ni mkhas pa rnams mngon par zhen
pa med kyi/ byis pa rnams mngon par zhen to/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ byis pa'i mtshan nyid ni ji lta bu/ mkhas pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ji lta bu yin/ 'jam
dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byis pa ni las kyi mtshan nyid do/ /mkhas pa ni chos kyi mtshan nyid do zhes gsungs so/ /rab 'byor gyis
smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ las kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid ni las te/ de la gang
dag mngon par 'du byed pa de dag gi ni yod par mngon no/ /gang dag mngon par 'du mi byed pa de dag gi ni med par mngon no/ /de la byis pa rnams ni mngon par 'du byed pas de
dag gi ni yod par mngon no/ /mkhas pa rnams ni mngon par 'du mi byed pas de dag gi ni med par mngon te/ de la gang yod pa dang / gang med pa'i dbus de ni 'phags pa rnams
kyi spyod yul lo/ /'phags pa'i spyod yul gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa ma yin pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ 'phags pa zhes bya
bas ci zhig bstan par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ 'phags pa zhes bya ba de ni rdul med cing nyon mongs pa med pa la yang dag par 'du ba'i bzhi'o/ /
rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ rnam grangs gang gis chos thams cad rdul med cing / nyon mongs pa med pa la yang dag par 'du bar
'gyur ba'i rnam grangs yod dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ yod do/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ rnam grangs gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
btsun pa rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen por chu thams cad yang dag par 'du ste/ de'ang 'di lta ste/ lan tshwa'i ror ro gcig go /btsun pa rab 'byor/ de
bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang rdul med cing nyon mongs pa med pa yang dag par 'du zhing / de'ang 'di lta ste/ rnam par grol ba'i ror ro gcig go /rab 'byor
gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ gang las rnam par thar par bya ba'i phyir rnam par grol ba ston/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du sems/
gang yod na 'ching bar 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ mi shes pa yod na 'ching bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ de bas
na mi shes pa las rnam par thar par bya ba'i phyir rnam par grol ba bstan to/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ chos thams cad la tha dad par bya ba med na shes
pa'am mi shes par ji ltar bstan/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dpyid kyis bsros pa'i chu la ni dro ba zhes bstan to/ /chu de nyid
grang ba'i dus su ni grang ba zhes bstan to/ /chu de la ni tha dad du bya ba cung zad kyang med do/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ /de bzhin du tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pas bsros
ba'i sems la ni mi shes pa zhes bstan to/ /tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la ni shes pa zhes bstan te/ de la nang gi byed pa'i skyes bu de'i shes pa'am/ mi shes par bstan pa
ni gang yang med do/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ don de ni rtogs par dka'o/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ gnyis la spyod pa rnams kyis
so| |rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ don de ni mthong bar dka'o/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ /shes rab kyi mig dang bral ba rnams kyis so/ /
rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ don de ni gting dpag dka' ba'o/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ /gting ma rnyed pa rnams kyis so/ /rab 'byor
gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ don de ni shes par dka' ba'o/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can rnams kyis so/ /rab 'byor gyis smras
pa| 'jam dpal/ don de ni go bar dka' ba'o/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang bral ba rnams kyis
so| |rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ don de ni mos par dka' ba'o/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ kun gzhi la dga' ba rnams kyis so/ /rab
'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ don de ni brtag mi nus pa'o/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 'di ltar der mtshan ma kun tu mi 'byung ngo / /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
'jam dpal/ don de ni rtog ge'i spyod pa can ma yin pa'o/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 'di ltar de la so sor rnam par rig pa med do/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam
dpal/ don de ni mchog tu 'phags pa'o/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 'di ltar de ni bsngo ba'i 'du shes dang bral ba'o/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ don
de ni mkhas pa dang mdzangs pas rig pa'o/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 'di ltar de ni bdag nyid kyis rig pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ de bzhin
gshegs pas gang don du na don ni don ma yin pa'o zhes de skad bshad pa tshig de'i dgongs pa'i tshig bshad pa ji lta bu yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa
rab 'byor/ don ces bya ba ni brjod du med pa'i don to/ /de la gang dag brjod du yod pa'i don la spyod pa de dag gi don ni don ma yin te/ de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis don du na don
de ni don ma yin pa'o zhes de skad bka' stsal to/ /gzhan yang / btsun pa rab 'byor/ don ces bya ba ni dpen pa'i don to/ /de la gang dag lus dang / ngag dang / sems dang mtshungs
bar ldan pa'i don la spyod pa de dag gi don ni don ma yin te/ de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang don du na don ni don ma yin pa'o zhes de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor gyis
smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ chos thams cad chos ma yin pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis ci las dgongs te de skad bka' stsal/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab
'byor/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs gzings dang 'dra bar shes pa rnams kyis chos nyid kyang spang bar bya na chos ma yin pa lta ci smos zhes de skad ces bka' stsal
te| gang spang bar bya ba de ni chos dang chos ma yin pa zhes mi bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ ci sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang chos ma yin nam/ 'jam dpal
gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la ni yang dag par grub pa gang yang med do/ /gang yang dag par grub pa ma yin pa de ni chos dang chos ma yin pa
zhes mi bya'o/ /de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang chos thams cad ni chos ma yin pa'o zhes de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
'jam dpal/ las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag bshad pa 'di thos nas mi skrag mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur ba ni ngo mtshar to/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
btsun pa rab 'byor/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ brgya la seng ge'i phrug gu seng ge'i sgra thos nas skrag gam/ dngang ngam/ dngang bar 'gyur ram/ ngang pa'i rgyal po'i phrug gu
nam mkha'i dkyil na 'phur ba na ngang pa'i sgra thos nas skrag gam/ dngang ngam/ dngang bar 'gyur ram/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ de ni ma yin te/ seng ge'i
phrug gu rang gi sgra dang / ngang pa'i rgyal po'i phrug gu rang gi spyod yul gyis mi skrag go /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs
pa'i rigs dang / gdung las skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin nyid dang / stong pa nyid las nges par byung pa de rnams ni chos thams cad dang / sgra thams cad
dang / bshad pa thams cad kyis mi skrag mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur mod kyi/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ 'on kyang gang yod na skrag par 'gyur zhes sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras
pa| 'jam dpal/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba yod na skrag par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba de byang chub sems dpas yongs su
shes te/ de bas na chos thams cad kyis mi skrag go /de sgra thams cad dang / bshad pa thams cad kyis mi skrag mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam
dpal/ gal te byang chub sems dpas 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes na/ de ji ltar 'bras bu ma thob/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems
dpa' ni 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa'i phyir 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa ma yin gyi/ 'bras bu 'thob pa la btang snyoms su bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thob par 'dod
pa'i phyir sems can thams cad la snying rje chen pos sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes te/ de bas na 'bras bu mi 'thob bo/ /rab 'byor gyis
smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa'i thabs gang gis byang chub sems dpas 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes la 'bras bu'ang mi 'thob pa de ni thabs chen po yin
no| |'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi dbyings ni thabs dang shes rab kyis yang dag par zin pa ste/ de bas na byang
chub sems dpa' de 'jig tshogs la lta ba'ang yongs su shes la 'bras bu'ang mi thob bo/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes
bu tshan po che zhig gis mtshon cha rnon pos shing sA la chen po bcad na/ de ril gyis chad bzhin du de nyid na 'dug ste mi 'gyel lo/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang
chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi dbyings kyang thabs dang shes rab kyis yang dag par zin te/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' de 'jig tshogs la lta ba'ang yongs su shes
la 'bras bu'ang mi 'thob bo/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ gang shing sA la chen po de char pa chen po bab ste gsher cing brlan par gyur na slar yang skye zhing yal ga dang / lo ma dang /
me tog dang / 'bras bu dag kyang 'byung la/ gang sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dus dang / de lta bu'i skabs kyang yod do/ /btsun pa rab
'byor| de bzhin du byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen pos gsher cing brlan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes la khams gsum
du'ang skye zhing gang sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ba tshe dang / rigs dang / skye ba'ang ston par byed do/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ gang shing sA la chen po de
rlung chen po'i shugs kyis phul nas la ltung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dus dang / de lta bu'i skabs kyang yod do/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ de bzhin du ye shes chen po'i rlung gi shugs
kyis phul na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po 'gog par ltung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam
dpal khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs dang shes rab kyis yang dag par zin pa'i ye shes kyi dbyings dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i
chos bstan pa de ni legs par bshad de/ legs so/ /legs so/ /'jam dpal/ 'on kyang dpe gang dag bstan pas byang chub sems dpa'i thabs dang shes rab shes par
'gyur pa'i dpe ngas kyang bstan gyi/ nyon cig /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ klu'i rgyal po mthu dang ldan pas sems dpa'i dbang gis sprin gyi phung po gcig las char pa'i
bdag nyid dang / glog gi phreng ba'ang gtong ngo / /skye bar byed pa'i bdag nyid chu'i rgyun kyang gtong ngo / /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang thabs dang shes rab dang /
ye shes kyi sprin gcig las sems can so so'i skye bo rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi spyod pa'ang ston to/ /gdul bar bya ba'i sems can rnams
gdul ba'i phyir 'phags pa thams cad kyi spyod pa'ang ston to/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ri'i rgyal po gangs ri la dri'i shing zhig yod de/
de'i rtsa ba'i dri'ang gzhan/ sdong po'i dri'ang gzhan/ yal ga'i dri'ang gzhan/ lo ma'i dri'ang gzhan/ me tog gi dri'ang gzhan/ 'bras bu'i dri'ang gzhan no/ /'jam dpal/ de
bzhin du dri'i shing lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus de'ang sems can rnams ji ltar mos pa bzhin du so so ci rigs par chos kyi dri gtong ste/ snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba'i dri de las
kyang mi g.yo'o/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ brgya byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin po che lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi mgul du thogs na/ de la sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas
thams cad dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi dga' ba dang / rtse ba'i tshogs thams cad snang yang nor bu rin po che de ni rnam par mi rtog go /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du nor
bu rin po che dag pa lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi dbyings de'ang bya ba thams cad kyang ston la/ thams cad du'ang rnam par mi rtog go /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper
na| nor bu rin po che yid bzhin du 'gro ba zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par byed kyang nor bu rin po che de ni
rnam par mi rtog go /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du nor bu rin po che lta bur lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin yongs
su rdzogs par byed kyang byang chub sems dpa' de ni rnam par mi rtog go /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' la me'ang 'bar zhing char pa'ang 'bab mod kyi/ nam mkha'
la ni tsha ba'ang med/ grang bar 'gyur ba'ang med do/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du thabs mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang kun tu 'bar ba'i khams gsum na'ang gnas shing mya
ngan las 'das pa'i zhi ba la'ang spyod mod kyi/ tsha ba'ang med/ grang bar 'gyur ba'ang med do/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' la dug gi shing yang skye/ sman gyi
shing yang skye mod kyi/ nam mkha' la ni dug gi shing gis nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur/ sman gyi shing gis rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du thabs
mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang dug gi shing lta bu'i phung po'ang 'chang / sman gyi shing lta bu'i dbang po'ang 'chang mod kyi/ phung po'i nyon mongs pas nyon mongs par yang mi
'gyur/ rnam par dag pa'i dbang pos rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur la/ gnyis ka'i bya ba'ang byed do/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chu'i snod bu gu brgya yod pa la/
bu gu gcig bkag na thams cad nas mi 'dzag go /bu gu gcig bye na thams cad nas kyang 'dzag go /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' mnyam
par bzhag pa'i tshe mngon par shes pa chen po la yongs su rdzogs par byed kyi yul la mi 'dzag go /yang langs pa na 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la so so ji ltar 'os pa chos
bstan pa'i phyir yul thams cad du zag go /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mchog tu mthu dang ldan pa'i rta cang shes ni rta zhon pa la srung bar byed de/ bdag la ni de lta ma yin
no| |'jam dpal/ de bzhin du snying rje chen po thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu mthu dang ldan pa dag ni sems can rnams la srung bar byed de/ bdag la ni de lta ma yin
no| |'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ri dwags kyi rgyal po seng ge ni me 'bar ba ma gtogs par cis kyang mi 'jigs so/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du byang chub sems
dpa' yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba ma gtogs par cis kyang mi 'jigs so/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bal glang gi rgyal pos srung gi bu ni
dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs mod kyi/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi bsod nams bsags pa'i phyir dga' ba dang rtse ba'i tshogs
thams cad so so ci rigs par ston to/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song yang 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams so so ci rigs par yongs
su smin par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi tshogs thams cad ston to/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gang gtsub stan las byung ba dang / gang nor bu rin po che las byung ba'i me de gnyis
ka'ang tsha ba'i bdag nyid do/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang sems dang po bskyed pa dang / gang byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i sems tha ma bskye pa de
gnyis ka'ang sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa sreg pa'i bdag nyid do/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dri'i shing sna tshogs rnams ni de dag thams cad khams bzhis
yongs su bzung ste skye'o/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs kyi tshogs bsags pa de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub kyi sems
kyis yongs su bzung zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngos na skye'o/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i 'khor lo rin po che gang du
'gro ba der 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dpung gi tshogs thams cad 'dong ngo / /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i thabs dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa gang du 'gro ba der byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad 'dong ngo / /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bya'i rgyal
po ka la ping+ka'i phrug gu sgo nga'i sbubs na 'dug pa sgo nga mi chag cing sbubs nas ma byung yang 'di lta ste/ sgra yid du 'ong ba ka la ping+ka'i sgra nyid sgrogs so/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin
du byang chub sems dpa' ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs su zhugs pa/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba ma bcom pa/ khams gsum nas mngon par ma byung yang 'di lta ste/ sgra stong pa nyid
dang | mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sgra nyid sgrogs so/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ka
la ping+ka rma bya'i nang du song na ka la ping+ka'i sgra mi sgrogs so/ /ka la ping+ka'i nang du song na ni ka la ping+ka'i sgra sgrogs so/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi nang du song na sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgra mi sgrogs so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i nang du song na ni sangs rgyas kyi chos
bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgra sgrogs so/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rnam par 'thor rlung ni dzam+bu'i gling gi shing ngam/ khang pa'am/ gzhal med khang ngam/ sa
phyogs rnams kyis bzod par mi nus so/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su sgrogs pa na sangs rgyas kyi byin
kyi rlabs kyis byin gyis ma brlabs pa'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis mos pa'am/ dad par mi nus te/ gang dag sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa de dag ni
mos shing yid ches so/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi ma'i 'od ni gtsang ba dang / mi gtsang ba gnyis ka la 'char mod kyi/ gtsang ba la'ang rjes su chags par mi byed/
mi gtsang ba la'ang khong khro bar mi byed de/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni gang du'ang brjod par bya ba ma yin no/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer kyang
nyan thos dang / so so'i skye bo la 'char mod kyi/ nyan thos rnams la rjes su chags par yang mi byed/ so so'i skye bo rnams la khong khro bar yang mi byed/ byang chub sems dpa' ni gang
du'ang brjod par bya ba ma yin no/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi lo ma lhags par gyur pa de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams ring
por mi thogs par shing yongs 'du sa brtol 'di me tog dang / 'bras bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro snyam nas yid dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du nam byang chub sems
dpa' bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar gyur pa de'i tshe ring por mi thogs par byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas
kyi chos kyi me tog dang / 'bras bu sbyin par 'gyur ro zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bstod par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shing gang dag
rlung gis btud/ kun tu btud/ rab tu btud pa de dag 'gyel bar 'jigs pa med do/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sems can thams cad
la 'dud/ kun tu 'dud/ rab tu 'dud pa de dag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'jigs pa med do/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chu ni gang du
dma' ba der 'bab bo/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du nga rgyal med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ga la ba der 'gro'o/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/
dper na/ nam rgya mtsho chen po dang po gnas pa de'i tshe sa chen po thams cad kyi nang na dma' ba'i sa phyogs der dang por gnas te/ de nas 'bab chu'i rgyun thams cad tshegs
chung dus der mngon du 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du nga rgyal med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la tshegs chung ngus sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thams
cad du mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che rdo rjes nor bu rin po che thams cad 'bigs mod kyi/ nor bu rin po che rdo rje de ni de dag gis mi
phigs so/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams 'dul mod kyi/ de dag gi 'dul ba der yang mi ltung ngo / /'jam dpal/
'di lta ste/ dper na/ me tog man+dA ra ba rlung gis bskyod na dpag tshad brgya kho ra khor yug tu dris khyab bo/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa'i ye
shes kyis bskyod pa'ang sems can thams cad la byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i dris khyab par byed do/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gang dag me tog man+dA ra
ba'i dri snom pa de dag ni nad thams cad kyis mi 'debs so/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i dri snom pa de dag
nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba med na u dum+bA ra'i me tog mi 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/
de bzhin du byang chub tu sems bskyed pa med na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi me tog kyang mi 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa char 'beb pa de'i
tshe/ dzam+bu'i gling thams cad khyab par char 'bebs so/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du nam byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos kyi char 'bebs pa de'i tshe sems
can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud la mnyam par 'bebs so/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mtsho chen po ma dros pa las klung gi rgyun bzhi 'bab ste/ rgya mtsho chen po
bzhi yongs su 'gengs so/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi 'bab pas ye shes kyi rgya mtsho chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /
'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po med na dzam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams nor bu rin po che la spyod par mi 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas 'byung
ba med na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par grol ba'i chos rin po che la spyod par mi 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gzugs gang
ci'ang rung ste/ de dag thams cad 'byung ba chen po bzhis yongs su bzung ngo / /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du gang byang chub sems dpa'i chos gang ci'ang rung ste/ de dag
thams cad byin gyis rlabs bzhis yongs su bzung ngo / /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ g.yang sa nyam nga ba na 'dug pa'i sman gyi shing skye bo mang po'i nye bar 'tsho bar mi
'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du nyan thos 'khor bas 'jigs pa'i g.yang sa nyam nga bar gnas pa rnams kyi ni skye bo mang pos nye bar 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta
ste/ dper na/ grong khyer gyi nang na 'dug pa'i sman gyi shing ni skye bo mang po'i nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i nang du
song ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems bskyed pas sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gang
dbyar byung ba'i chu mig de dag ni yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du gang nyan thos rnams kyis chos bstan pa de ni yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur ro/ /
'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gang dpyid byung ba'i chu mig de ni yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du gang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos
bstan pa de ni yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ri'i rgyal po gangs ri'i shing gang dag bcad pa de dag ni slar yang myur du skye'o/ /'jam
dpal/ de bzhin du nam de bzhin gshegs pas bya ba byas te yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan bsngags pa tshad ma
mchis pa dang ldan pa de dag gi yang dag pa'i yon tan bsngags pa 'di lta bu 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems
dpa' de dag yang dag pa'i yon tan bsngags pa de lta bu de dag thos nas dga' bar mi 'gyur/ rgyags par mi 'gyur ba de'ang mchog tu ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad ni rtsa ba dag pa ste/ yang dag pa'i yon tan dang bsngags pa brjod pas dga' bar yang mi
'gyur/ rgyags par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rtsa ba gang las dag pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/
rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag med pa'i rtsa ba dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang / gang zag med pa'i rtsa ba dang /
'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtsa ba dang / ma rig pa dang srid pa'i sred pa'i rtsa ba dang / nga dang nga'i zhes bya ba'i rtsa ba las dag go /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ dag pa zhes
bgyi bas ci zhig bstan pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ ma bzung / ma btang ba ste/ de bas na dag pa zhes bya'o/ /ma skyes/ ma 'gags/ ma brtags/ rnam par ma brtags/ ma phyung /
ma bcug /ma byas/ rnam par ma byas/ mun pa ma yin/ snang ba ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ bcings pa ma yin/ thar pa ma yin/ 'khor
ba ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin te/ de bas na dag pa zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te 'khor ba'ang ma lags/ mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ma lags
na de la dag pa de gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gang mya ngan las 'das par yang rlom sems med la 'khor ba la mngon par zhen pa'ang med pa de nyid 'dir dag
pa'o| |rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' dag pa zhes bya'ang nam mkha' ni dag pa'ang ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'ang ma yin te/ 'on kyang nam mkha' ni dag
pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa dag pa zhes bya'ang mya ngan las 'das pa ni dag pa'ang ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'ang ma yin te/ 'on kyang
mya ngan las 'das pa dag pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di ci snyam du sems/ khyod ci dag pa yin mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ nam kun nas nyon mongs pa ma
mchis pa de'i tshe bdag dag pa'o/ /bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i rnam par dag pa gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi dbyings ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa ste/ bdag gis de yongs su rtogs pas de'i slad du yongs su dag go /bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ chos kyi dbyings yongs su shes par nus sam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te chos kyi dbyings ma gtogs par
chos gzhan 'ga' zhig mchis na ni des chos kyi dbyings yongs su 'tshal bar 'gyur gyi/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyis ni chos kyi dbyings yongs su mi 'tshal to/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gal te chos kyi dbyings ma gtogs par gang chos kyi dbyings yongs su shes pa'i chos de'ang med na chos kyi dbyings de khyod kyis
ji ltar yongs su shes/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor cang mi smra bar gyur to// //bam po gnyis pa/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon
nur gyur pas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor cang mi smra bar gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor khyod ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis smras pa'i lan glan pa las
'dug par 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ gang gi tshe sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma zhugs pa de'i tshe kho bo 'dug go/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
nyan thos rnams kyi spobs pa ni thogs pa dang bcas pa/ bar chad dang bcas pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni thogs pa med pa/ bar chad med pa'o/ /
'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ ci btsun pa rab 'byor/ chos kyi dbyings la thogs pa'am/ bar chad pa gang yang dmigs sam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ de ni ma yin te/
chos kyi dbyings la ni thogs pa'am/ bar chad pa mi dmigs so/ /smras pa/ 'on ci'i phyir/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'chad pa las bar chad du gyur/ smras pa/ 'jam
dpal/ gang gis chos kyi dbyings la yongs su chad pa'i tshul gyis yongs su shes pa de dag ni 'chad pa bar chad pa yin gyi/ gang yang chos kyi dbyings la tshad med pa'i tshul
gyis yongs su shes pa de dag ni chad par mi 'chad do/ /smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ ci chos kyi dbyings la yongs su chad pa gang yang yod dam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal/
de ni ma yin te/ chos kyi dbyings ni kun gyi sgo ste/ chos kyi dbyings la yongs su chad pa gang yang med de/ smras pa/ 'on ci'i phyir/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ chos kyi dbyings la
yongs su chad par ston/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ nyan thos kyi yul tshad mar byas te chos kyi dbyings yongs su chad par ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi yul
tshad mar byas te/ de ni chos kyi dbyings tshad med par ston to/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ ci btsun pa rab 'byor/ chos kyi dbyings yul las byung ngam/ rab 'byor gyis
smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ chos kyi dbyings yul las byung ba ma yin te/ 'jam dpal/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings ni yul med pa/ yul dang bral ba'o/ /'jam dpal
gyis smras pa/ 'o na ci'i phyir/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ yul tha dad par ston/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ nyan thos rnams kyi spobs pa ni thogs pa dang bcas
pa/ bar chad dang bcas pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni thogs pa med pa/ bar chad med pa'o zhes dang po nyid du kho bos ma smras sam/ 'jam dpal gyis
smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor khyod kyis so so yang dag par rig pa ma thob bam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ kho bos so so yang dag par rig pa thob bo/ /'jam
dpal gyis smras pa/ 'o na ci'i phyir/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ 'chad ba bar chad/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ nyan thos rnams kyi so so yang dag par rig pa
ni sems can gyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang bral ba ste/ de bas na 'chad pa bar chad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi so so yang dag par rig pa ni/
sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pas bskyed pa ste/ de bas na 'chad pa bar mi 'chad do/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ ci ye shes kyi dbyings
gang gis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi so so yang dag par rig pa'i ye shes bskyed pa'i ye shes kyi dbyings de bar chad pa'i mtshan nyid yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam
dpal/ de ni ma yin te/ ye shes kyi dbyings ni thogs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid bar chad pa med pa'i rang bzhin can no/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ gal
te ye shes kyi dbyings thogs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid bar chad pa med pa'i rang bzhin can yin na/ 'o na ci'i phyir/ 'chad pa bar chad/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ tshe
dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di nyan thos rnams kyi nang na shes rab che ba'i mchog tu bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs kyi/ 'di la dris shig dang / 'di nyid khyod la 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /
tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nyid kyis shod cig /kho bo ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas chos bstan pa nyan par 'dod kyi/ 'chad par ni mi 'dod
do| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di sngon sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po'i spyan snga na chos 'chad cing / nyan thos chen po dag
kyang cang mi smra bar gzhog pa kho bos mthong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag mang po 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi
khams dang ba can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od kyi tog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing
gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /de na nyan thos chen po shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba nyan thos rnams kyi nang na shes rab che ba'i mchog tu bcom ldan 'das des gsungs so/ /bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od kyi tog de nam nang du yang dag 'jog par gyur pa de'i tshe nyan thos chen po shes rab sgron
ma de tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad du mngon par song ste/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dun par byas nas chos ston to/ /kho bo
po dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'ang 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin te/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag mang po dang / lha'i bu brgya phrag stong yang chos
nyan par 'dod pa'i phyir 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i phyir 'brang bar gyur to/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'od gsal gyi lha'i rigs su 'dug ste/ mgul bsal
ba'i sgra gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sgras go bar 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi gnas thams cad spa gong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mgul
bsal ba'i sgra phyung ngo / /de nas nyan thos chen po des mgul bsal ba'i sgra de thos pa dang / mgul bsal ba'i sgra de'i shugs ma bzod pas rnam par 'thor rlung gis bus pa'i
bya bzhin du sa la lhung ste/ de dngangs te spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas/ ngo ma tshar du bzung ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas 'od kyi tog de ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
bcom ldan 'das/ mgul bsal ba'i sgra gang thos pas bdag mgul bsal ba'i sgra'i shugs de ma bzod pas rnam par 'thor rlung gis bus pa'i bya bzhin du dogs la lhung
bar gyur pa'i mgul bsal ba'i sgra zab mo 'di lta bu 'di sus bgyis/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ dge slong 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba phyir
mi ldog pa skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de nga la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / yongs su zhu ba dang /
yongs su legs par zhu bar bya ba'i phyir chags pa med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis rnam par rtse zhing 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de
'od gsal gyi lha'i ris su 'dug nas mgul bsal ba'i sgra gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sgras go bar 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi
gnas thams cad spa gong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mgul bsal ba'i sgra phyung ngo / /des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ skyes bu dam pa de lta bu dag mthong na legs par
'gyur gyi/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bdag cag gis kyang blta bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas 'od kyi tog gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir mtshan ma mdzad do/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'
de dag dang / lha'i bu de dag dang lhan cig tu bar snang de las babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od kyi
tog ga la ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor nas 'khor dang bcas te ji ltar rang gi
smon lam dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus sprul pa'i stan la phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas 'od kyi tog gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal khyod don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong nas 'jig rten gyi khams dang ba can
'dir 'ongs/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / yongs su zhu ba dang / yongs su legs par zhu ba'i slad
du'o| /bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag
byas par 'gyur/ ji ltar na bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur/ ji ltar na yongs su zhus par 'gyur/ ji ltar na yongs su legs par zhus par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol
ba| bcom ldan 'das/ nam chos mthong ba shin tu rnam par dag pa de lta bu ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba shin tu rnam par dag pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nam lus
dang sems kyis 'dud par mi bgyid/ rab tu 'dud par mi bgyid cing bgyid pa ma mchis/ zhum pa ma mchis par gnas pa/ mi g.yo ba thob pa/ sems
dben pa'i ngang tshul du spyod pa/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du bgyid pa de lta bus ni de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nam bdag tu
sgro 'dogs par mi bgyid/ gzhan du sgro 'dogs par mi bgyid/ mnyam pa nyid la mnyam par mi bgyid/ mi mnyam pa nyid la mi mnyam par mi bgyid cing / bgyid pa ma
mchis/ rnam par bgyid pa ma mchis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang yang spyod pa gcig tu gyur pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / chos kyi sku'i rjes su 'jug pa/ gang
gi lus kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi rjes su zhugs par mthong ba/ mthong ba la mthong bar mi mthong ba/ log par mi mthong ba/ gang la'ang ring por mi 'gyur ba/ nye bar mi 'gyur
ba de lta bu ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nam tshul bzhin ma lags par ni ma lags kyi/ nam tshul bzhin du zhu ba/
tshul bzhin ma lags pa/ ci'ang mi mthong ba/ bdag gi tshul bzhin gyis chos thams cad kyi tshul bzhin gyi rjes su mchi ba g.yengs pa'i sems kyis ma lags kyi/ mnyam
par bzhag pas zhu ba/ gang zhu ba dang / gang gi slad du zhu ba dang / gang la zhu ba de dus gsum yongs su 'tshol zhing / 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas zhu ba de lta bu ni de bzhin
gshegs pa la yongs su zhus par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nam zhu ba mchis pa la rtogs par mi bgyid pa/ ji skad gsungs pa'i rjes su mthun par bgyid pa/ de bzhin
gshegs pa mnyes par bgyid pa/ 'khor thams cad mgu bar bgyid pa/ yongs su zhu ba la mi chags pa/ yongs su zhu ba des kyang sems can tshad ma mchis pa rnams byang chub
tu go cha skon zhing / go cha de'ang nam byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du mi 'dor ba de lta bu ni de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su legs par zhu ba bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od kyi tog des 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal
de bzhin gshegs pa la de ltar blta bar bya'o/ /de ltar phyag bya'o/ /de ltar bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /de ltar yongs su zhu bar bya'o/ /de ltar yongs su legs par zhu ba bya'o zhes smras
pa de ni khyod kyis legs par bshad de/ legs so/ /legs so/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas nyan thos chen po shes rab sgron ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang
ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa la ji ltar mthong / ji ltar phyag 'tshal/ ji ltar bsnyen bkur byed/ ji ltar yongs su zhu/ ji ltar yongs su legs
par zhu/ des smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ bstan pa 'di lta bu ni kho bo cag lta bu nyan thos gzhan gyi sgra'i rjes su mos pa rnams kyi yul ma yin no/ /smras pa/ 'o na gang / mngon
